m62c.description: A weak animal-person agrees separately with two strong ones to pull a rope with him. They do not know that are engaged into tug-of-war with each other or that the rope is tied to a tree. (In New World motif borrowed from Afroamericans)

i91.name: Water body a the base of a tree
i91.description: There is a source or body of water at the base of a tree which connects layers of the universe and/or has gigantic dimensions and considered to be the main tree of the world

i82e.name: Star who sold her mother
i82e.description: It is told about Venus or other star that she sold her mother or father to have a beautiful attire

b22.name: Offended person destroys the tree
b22.description: People who have climbed up a tree do not share food with a person who remained below. He or she revenges on them destroying the tree. The events have cosmic dimensions

l5f.name: Helpful skull
l5f.description: A bodiless head, face, or skull is a woman's husband, suitor or son. He is not dangerous but a good provider, saves people from hunger, etc.

m122.name: Advisers inside
m122.description: In a difficult situation animal person asks for advice his tail, anus or some beings that are inside him (excrements, parasites, his "sisters", etc.)

c6d.name: The earth-diver
c6d.description: Persons or creatures get from the bottom of the ocean or from the lower world small amount of solid substance which turns into the earth

k19d.name: Star’s husband suffers from cold
k19d.description: When a man who has married a star gets to the sky, he suffers severe cold and dies either of cold or after touching a forbidden fire

k6.name: Vine from body excretions
k6.description: A vine grows from person's or animal's tears, mucus, urine, etc.

i100b.name: The Pleiades are a group of people
i100b.description: The Pleiades are any people (of any ages and sex, combined data of i99-i100a)

k10b.name: Cage carried away
k10b.description: A giant bird carries away to its nest a cage or bag with people inside

f74.name: Naked person shams dead
f74.description: When a person sees a dangerous enemy, he or she shams dead taking his or her clothes off, or the enemy takes off them himself. The enemy believes that it is a corpse, lets it alone

l38a.name: A sticky trap
l38a.description: Person sticks to an object, usually touching it one by one with his body members. The object is a trap of demonic creature or is a non human creature itself

m81d.name: Blind persons cured
m81d.description: A man comes across (often in the sky) one or two blind persons and cures their eyes

i87a1.name: Small or big? A dialogue
i87a1.description: Two persons engaged into dialogue describe a series of objects and creatures as simultaneously giant and small

k80c.name: The cranes of Ibycus
k80c.description: Person becomes a victim of a murder. Just before dying he or she calls on some birds (animals, celestial bodies, etc.) to bear witness for the crime. Getting to see these birds (the animal, the Moon, etc.) the murderer reveals himself without thinking. Or the birds, being the only witnesses, bring the investigators to the murderers

k27q.name: Task: to bring milk of dangerous animal
k27q.description: A task: to bring milk of dangerous animal

k120a.name: Three dresses
k120a.description: In order to delay a wedding with an undesirable suitor (her own brother or father, a monster), a girl asks him to give her a dress (often three dresses in succession) of unusual material (like gold, of fly wings, etc.). He does it but the girl runs away

f13.name: Red penis of primates
f13.description: Human or monkey's genitals becomes red after being injured during copulation with the girl who had toothed vagina or had not any vagina

k60a.name: How strong are bonds?
k60a.description: Person lets be firmly tied up when another one say that it's only a joke (e.g. a test to see can the first one break bonds)

d9.name: Fire and vulture
d9.description: Raven or other big dark-feathered bird scavenger is the owner, personification, spouse, obtainer or stealer of fire, daylight, or the Sun

i66.name: Ashes on Milky Way
i66.description: Milky Way is ashes or smoldering coals

l48.name: Demons devour their comrades
l48.description: A man kills (usually in a tree, on a rock, at the edge of a well, of a precipice) and/or throws down one of his enemies. The other enemies do not recognize their comrade and think that their prey is falling down

i82d.name: Morning and Evening stars are a man and a woman
i82d.description: Morning and Evening stars are opposed as a man and a woman or vice versa

b42m1.name: Yurak, Selkup and Tungus
b42m1.description: Every one of three (rare: four) hunters who pursuing an elk get to the sky and become stars is identified with a person of particular nationality

m39d.name: Four plaintiffs and one defendant
m39d.description: In succession and unintentionally a man causes damage to others. All of them together bring him to the court. In each case the judge makes decisions that are formally logical but patently unacceptable and saves the man

h24.name: Container opened too early
h24.description: Container with valuables or with dangerous creatures is opened (before time). Its content goes out of control or disappear

c29.name: A listened in secret
c29.description: People or God get know a secret thanks to listening in its possessor when he speaks aloud with himself or with his relations. Before this the wise person was usually asked to come and share his knowledge but was offended and went away

m193.name: Flight inside pumpkin
m193.description: To pass unnoticed dangerous animals on his or her way back, person crawls into a gourd, a big cattle, etc. and is rolling inside it along the road, or he walks transforming his appearance in a bizarre way

h36a.name: Origin of death from the falsified message
h36a.description: Person is sent by god to bring instructions or certain objects but distorts, forgets or replaces them. Because of this people become mortal (do not revive after death)

k38e.name: Of copper, of silver, of gold
k38e.description: Loci or objects of three (rare – four) different materials are mentioned in such a way that all of them have positive connotations though unequal value (copper, silver and gold; silver, gold and diamonds, etc.)

i100.name: The Pleiades are girls
i100.description: The Pleiades are a group of girls or women (with children)

m153a.name: The clean pig
m153a.description: The predator wants to eat a person or animal; the victim asks for a favor to let him first wash himself and escapes

g8e.name: Cutting the Moon tree
g8e.description: Person tries to cut down the tree in the Moon but the notch disappears and the tree becomes intact

e5d.name: Predator devours emerging people
e5d.description: People live underground or in a small enclosure. When they come out they are attacked by monster or dangerous animal. Monster is killed or transformed

i25.name: The bribed guards
i25.description: Way to the place of a certain person is guided by dangerous creatures (which often stand on the both sides of the pathway). Person placates them by gifts or nice talk, and they let him or her go the both ways, sometimes being punished for this by their master

k140.name: Ostentatiously ungrateful
k140.description: Travelling with his sibling, a youth regularly kills those who help him and save him creating for himself ever more problems

j64.name: The column of smoke
j64.description: Person ascends to the sky on a column of smoke (but not being burned in a fire)

k48a.name: Birds decorate hero’s attire
k48a.description: Alive birds and beasts decorate hero's costume and headgear. Imposter steals hero's attire, takes his place but the birds and beasts are mute or cry differently

m29q.name: Trickster is a racoon
m29q.description: In episodes related to deception, absurd, obscene or anti-social behavior the protagonist is a racoon

f8.name: Women and men come together
f8.description: Initially women and men live apart from each other. Later they meet each other and become to live together

m123.name: Raven marries goose
m123.description: A bird of prey or a carrion-eater (raven, owl, hawk; coyote) marries or tries to marry goose-person or other water bird. This marriage is not realized or is a short one

k14a.name: Thrown into the oven himself
k14a.description: An antagonist orders to kill the first one who will come in the morning to a certain place. The hero becomes late by chance, the antagonist or his wife or son come and are thrown into the fire

l72.name: The obstacle flight
l72.description: Running away from a dangerous being, person throws objects that turn into mighty obstacles on the way of the pursuer

m155.name: Sleeping parent covered with a cloak
m155.description: A man or a woman falls asleep in the nude or pretends to do so. Only one of his or her children covers him or her with a cloak and is considered to be the most noble

k32d.name: True bride sent to work
k32d.description: A girl (rare: boy) is walking to her or his relations or to her bridegroom. On the way the imposter lures her (him) to exchange clothes and takes her (his) place while the real girl (boy) is sent to look after crops or domestic animals. People hear her (his) song in which all the story is told. The deception is disclosed, the imposter killed

h54.name: The eyelids of Viy
h54.description: Eyelids or eyebrows of personage hang long down over his eyes. To make him see, eyelids should be propped up with poles, folks, etc.

m59.name: Treacherous rider kills ferry animal
m59.description: A small animal asks bigger one to bring him across the stream, rejects one by one all possible places to sit; finds the position that lets him kill the big animal after crossing the stream

m84d.name: Conversation of trees
m84d.description: A man listens in conversation of trees one of which is mortally ill

a45.name: The insulted Moon
a45.description: Person who teases or insults the Moon is punished

f16.name: Men and women: exchange of anatomical characteristics
f16.description: Initially men possessed women's biological traits and vice versa (beard, menses, breasts, bearing children)

k142.name: Corpse buried many times
k142.description: Person kills several people. asks somebody to bury only one and then tells that the dead man has returned. The grave-digger buries several people but believes that it was one and the same corpse

b2e.name: The male earth
b2e.description: The earth or the world as a whole is a male person

k99b.name: Eloping with the wrong man
k99b.description: At night a girl’s lover has to carry her away but falls asleep or is late. She is carried away by another man who happened to be on the place

k74a.name: Demon claims food and is wounded
k74a.description: A demonic person comes to the hero and claims food that the latter possesses or cooks. The hero overcomes and wounds him, follows his trace and comes to his world

c8b.name: Siblings change their looks and marry
c8b.description: In the beginning of time or after the world catastrophe brother and sister or mother and son are the only humans. They reject marriage or only the man does not want to marry his sister or mother. After their looks are changed (or only the sister or mother changes her face) they take each other for strangers, marry and beget the new race

b94.name: Talking trees
b94.description: Trees and (domestic) animals could talk and asked people not to cut or kill them

m162a.name: Cuts off his genitals
m162a.description: Person pretends to eat his own genitals. Another one believes him and cuts off his genitals

b87a.name: Alcor is a dog
b87a.description: Alcor is interpreted as a dog

i8f.name: One support of the world
i8f.description: Only one pole or mountain supports the earth or the sky

i85.name: Polaris is a pole, a nail
i85.description: Polaris is a (tethering) pole or a nail

b7d.name: Water flows from broken bone
b7d.description: Water flows from a broken bone (of a bird) producing a flood

i50.name: Animal with more than four legs
i50.description: An animal (a horse, an elk, a moose, a bear) with six, eight or ten legs is described or represented in art

f61.name: Trickster rapes a woman who carries him on her back
f61.description: A man pretends to be weak, ill or injured, asks a woman to carry him on her back. When she agrees, he makes attempt to copulate with her

m150.name: The deceitful herdsman`
m150.description: An animal person becomes a herdsman but eats the entrusted animals up

l106b.name: In search of lost object to the other world
l106b.description: In search of a lost object, usually carried away by water or wind, a girl or (rare) a boy comes to a powerful person, gets the object back and/or is rewarded. The object is related to the everyday life, it has no ritual significance and is not a weapon

i20.name: The underworld dworfs
i20.description: Race of dwarfs lives in the underworld

f18a.name: Long penis after prohibited sex
f18a.description: After contact with a non-human or prohibited partner (close kin, animal, spirit) man's penis becomes so long that he had to carry it in a basket, etc.

i13b.name: A horned snake
i13b.description: Snake of natural size has horns on its head

f46a.name: Woman in a tree
f46a.description: Men (animal people) discover a woman in a tree and copulate with her there

l126.name: Demonic small bird
l126.description: A small bird makes a powerful anthropomorphic person lose his temper. The bird cannot be annihilated, cries from inside person's stomach, the person suffers or dies

m135.name: Sham brains
m135.description: Eating much, person gets dirty (usually a fox covers his head with a milky substance or dough) but convinces others (a wolf or a bear) that his body looks strange because he has been badly injured

i6a.name: Male and female birds: different kinds of precipitation
i6a.description: The male and the female birds bring with them different kinds of precipitations (e.g. the male comes with a hail, the female with a rain)

k22c.name: Birds attacked
k22c.description: Inhabitants of a distant country suffer from periodic assaults of the enemies which are not dangerous for common people. These enemies (and sometimes the inhabitants of the country too) are birds

b8.name: Frog hides the water
b8.description: Frog hides all the water but other person makes it available for everybody

a23c.name: Who will fly higher?
a23c.description: Birds argue who of them will fly higher. One who seemed to have less chances wins (he hides himself in feathers of a strong bird using it as a vehicle)

k10d.name: Bird carries man to an island
k10d.description: A flying monster carries a man to a far away island. There he gets to kill the monster. To return, he uses a boat, a bridge or a rope made of parts of the monster's body

j10.name: Insect’s bite
j10.description: A woman loses her way after being bitter by insect (wasp, bee, ant). She accuses her unborn sons of being the cause of the bite and/or slaps herself on her abdomen to punish the sons or to kill the insect. As a consequence her sons are offended and do not show her the correct way anymore

a32dd.name: Firewood-carrier in the moon
a32dd.description: Person who carries a bundle of brushwood or firewood is seen in the moon.

m92.name: Red eyelashes
m92.description: Girls stick something red to old man's eyebrows and he thinks it is a fire

b35a.name: Tree fulfills wishes and then transforms into bear
b35a.description: Tree grants a man the fulfillment of his wishes but ultimately transforms him into a bear

l38.name: Demon’s trap
l38.description: A demon puts a trap to catch people, hero gets into it

b77.name: Primeval sky close to earth
b77.description: Originally the sky was close to the earth, then it has risen up

m152b.name: Brave donkey and cowardly lion
m152b.description: Getting to see a donkey or horse a strong predator thinks that this animal is dangerous. His further interpretation of the herbivorous’ behavior supports this impression

j3.name: Impregnated from under the earth
j3.description: A woman gives birth to a boy or twin boys after being impregnated without her knowledge when one of the animal persons crawls under the earth to the place where she sits on a ground

m42c.name: Falling from a bluff, eats his own marrow
m42c.description: Breaking his leg after falling from a bluff, person becomes to eat his own bone marrow

i43b.name: Milky Way is a serpent or fish
i43b.description: Milky Way is a reptile, fish, or chain of fish

k51a.name: Pushes into a boiling pot
k51a.description: The abandoned wife comes to the new one when the husband is not at home. She kills her rival pushing her head into boiling liquid or pouring it into her ear

m84a.name: Goat resuscitated
m84a.description: Supernatural beings kill and eat a deer, ram, cow or goat, then put all the bones in the animal's skin and the revived animal runs away

l85e.name: One-leg people
l85e.description: Person has only one leg (and one arm) but has no problems with moving. Unlike motif L85 (one-sided people), the person’s body is complete

f26.name: Origin of menses: sacred objects lost
f26.description: The transition of sacred sound instruments (bull-roarers, big trumpets, etc.) from women to men is connected with beginning of menses among the women

k56aa.name: The dog tests his bride
k56aa.description: Two or three girls in succession become brides of the dog. The first one or two act in a wrong way, perish or do not succeed. The last one behaves correctly, gets a reward

b36a.name: Bathing in blood
b36a.description: Birds or fish obtain their colors after smearing themselves with liquids extracted from the body of some being or dividing among themselves its bright skin or dress

e9k.name: Spouse is honey (bee)
e9k.description: A man or a woman is incarnation of the honey or a bee-person

h24a.name: A bag with stars
h24a.description: Person opens a bag with stars which ascend to sky in disorder

k27zz.name: Ogress and blinded wives
k27zz.description: A married man marries another woman who is a transformed ogress/witch. Thanks to her intrigues other wives (the first wife) are blinded and/or confined in an underground hole. A son of one of them overcomes the ogress, returns sight to his mother and her sisters

k102.name: Demonic paramour of mother or sister
k102.description: A woman who initially is a friend of the hero (his sister or mother) tries to kill him when she becomes allied to a demon whom the hero overcame or (rare) a man who tries to get rid of the hero

j56a.name: Transformed into griddles
j56a.description: Brothers turn into cooking pots or griddles which are put on fire. Only the eldest is strong enough to stand this trial

a12c.name: Eclipses: reptiles and fish
a12c.description: During an eclipse or at the sunset the Sun or the Moon are attacked by a reptile (a snake, a lizard, a dragon, a crocodile) or a fish

b2c.name: The earth as a child’s body
b2c.description: The earth as a whole or fertile soil is the body of a child, has been born by a woman

k12.name: Woman lost and returned
k12.description: A rival or adversary kidnaps man's wife or bride or takes her sending her man off. The man gets her back

l5h.name: Person stuck in an opening, head is torn off
l5h.description: Two sisters or two brothers get into demon's house. One crawls out through a tiny opening, another sticks there. Brother or sister pulls him or her by the head but tears it off

a26.name: The Sun-bird
a26.description: A bird incorporates the Sun or the day light. It can be caught, let free, killed

k13d.name: Leg hangs in the sky
k13d.description: A group of boys gets to the sky. The leg of the last one is cut or torn off

m75b1.name: Marco the Rich
m75b1.description: A man gets to know that a poor boy must inherit all his property or become a king and tries to prevent it, but the fate cannot be changed. The boy marries a rich girl, usually the daughter of his adversary

g9.name: Restored forest
g9.description: People break ground or fell trees. In the morning, the ground or forest are intact again

c6i.name: Dirt stuck to body turns into the earth
c6i.description: Bird or animal returns from the lower world smeared with dirt. It shakes itself or the dirt is scraped off. The dirt turns into the earth

f62.name: Incognito at the dancing party
f62.description: An (ostensibly) sick person remains at home when other go to the dancing party. The person comes by himself or herself looking like a handsome man or beautiful girl. The man (woman) does not recognize him (her) and suggests to make love

l1c1.name: An escape to the sky
l1c1.description: To escape from a demonic person, a group of men who are relations of a girl ascend to the sky and remain there

k56a8a.name: Kind girl returns with a handsome man
k56a8a.description: One girl goes to the other world, acts correctly and brings back an animal or a box with a handsome man inside. Another girl acts wrongly and suffers a reverse

e9b.name: Turtle-wife or snail-wife
e9b.description: The mysterious housekeeper is a water creature (turtle, snail, shellfish)

k38e1.name: Forest of metal trees
k38e1.description: Person travels across a forest with trees of two or more kinds of metal (copper, silver, etc.)

g17.name: Gift of a reptile
g17.description: Serpent or alligator is the original possessor or the source of cultivated plants or wild staples

f40c.name: Patriarch kills the boys
f40c.description: A powerful man kills every baby boy born by his wives or by his sister

m41.name: The eye-juggler
m41.description: Person plays throwing his eyes or (Alaska Athabascans) his tooth up or away. Eyes or tooth first come back to eye sockets or mouth but eventually are lost

l85a.name: One-sided child
l85a.description: Person is born as half of a child or loses his or her half in an accident. The person does not belong to any category of supernatural beings and usually turns into normal girl or young man

m129.name: Lost primogeniture
m129.description: Father or mother is going to give primogeniture to the son he or she has chosen. Another son comes in disguise of the chosen one, receives primogeniture

h55.name: Sinners in other world
h55.description: Person who visits the other world gets to see different people punished or rewarded according to their behavior when they were alive on earth

b32.name: Women turn into fish
b32.description: After a conflict with their husbands women turn into fish

k76e.name: Son the pig
k76e.description: An (adoptive) son is a pig. He marries a princess, turns into handsome man.

b1d.name: Good and bad workers
b1d.description: Two persons are creating the world, one is a good and and another a bad worker, that’s because separate parts of the world look differently

m100a.name: Jump from a cliff
m100a.description: An animal-person provokes another to jump from of a bluff or cliff because his father (grandfather, etc.) could do it. The one yielded to provocation jumps and dies

m186.name: Hedgehog is a participant of the race
m186.description: Hedgehog is a participant of the race and wins

a37a.name: Shooter hides underground
a37a.description: Small animal (marmot, rabbit, mole, toad, frog) or person who turns into this animal tried to hit the Sun with arrows and since then has been hiding from the Sun in underground holes or in the water

a23.name: Elections of the Sun to be
a23.description: The primeval ancestors come together to choose the best candidate to become the Sun and/or to send the Sun to the sky or to see how the Sun rises to the sky for the first time

m29x1.name: Trickster is a badger
m29x1.description: In episodes related to deception, absurd, obscene or anti-social behavior the protagonist is a badger

l15b1.name: Deer horn is a weapon against the evil
l15b1.description: During a fight between the good and the evil creators the good one chooses a deer horn for a weapon (because his adversary is afraid of it most of all)

i51b.name: The earth is an animal
i51b.description: The earth or the sky are identified with a big quadruped mammal or are made of parts of its body

m46b.name: Baby born by woman
m46b.description: Person turns into tiny object or creature. Touching or swallowing it, the woman conceives and gives birth to a baby-boy. The boy steals valuables or make love to the woman

k33a.name: Younger brother transformed into animal
k33a.description: Siblings (most often younger brother and elder sister) leave their home. One of them (most often the brother, most rare several brothers) turn into animal (usually an ungulate) or (rare) a bird but (in the most cases) ultimately acquires his or her human form again

a37.name: The Sun is attacked
a37.description: Person attacks the Sun (or several suns if they were many) with weapon

i94.name: The Pleiades are openings
i94.description: The Pleiades are holes in the firmament

i27a.name: Towns and paths of dogs
i27a.description: Souls of the dead dogs have their own towns in the Beyond or their own paths to travel there

m66.name: Itch after artichoke eating
m66.description: After eating certain plant, small animal, or rubbing it over his body, person suffers from itch, diarrhea, or from breaking wind

m42b.name: Eyes of gum
m42b.description: Person loses his eyes, makes new ones of gum and is able to see again (though usually not well)

m143.name: Fox in a well
m143.description: Getting into a well or pit and being unable to climb out animal person tricks another to descend and thanks to this gets out while the second person remains below

i13c.name: Snake’s crown
i13c.description: Reptiles possess treasure with magic properties. Person gets or tries to get it. Usually it is a crown, jewel or small horns on the snake's head

d6b.name: Burned person becomes a caiman
d6b.description: Badly burned person turns into caiman or crocodile

m108.name: Trickster carries away property
m108.description: Person suggests to ferry people's property across river but rides away with boat and load

k111.name: Animal suitors rejected, a man from the sky accepted
k111.description: Mother of a girl rejects in succession birds (and animals) who come to ask her daughter in marriage, but accepts a man from the sky (the Sun) as her son-in-law

g11.name: Squirrel the woodcutter
g11.description: A squirrel plays crucial role in felling the gigantic tree

m106b.name: “Last year” in a demon’s house
m106b.description: After doing damage or injury to his antagonist, person lies that his name is so and so. Other demons understand it not as a name but as a common word and it makes them believe that the injury had been done so long ago that there is no sense to investigate the case

k50.name: False wife beheads enemy
k50.description: A man disguised as a woman comes to his enemy and kills him at night (usually cuts off and carries away his head)

k48.name: Singing bird of the hero
k48.description: Hero has or obtains an unusual bird. An imposter steals it, takes the hero’s place but the bird is mute or cries differently. The hero returns, his bird sings again

c24.name: The world in danger of falling down
c24.description: A tree or pillar supports the sky or the earth. If it collapses, people perish

g8c.name: Cutting tree to get valuables
g8c.description: (Animal-)people try to fell a tree that contains water and fish or has cultivated plants on its branches. The notch disappears and the tree becomes intact

m8b.name: Birds break an obstacle to get water
m8b.description: Birds or (rare) animals work hard to break a rock or a cane and get water or honey concealed inside

k88.name: Eyes for food
k88.description: For minor compensation or because of deceit person lets another one to make him blind

a32f.name: Water-carrier in the Moon
a32f.description: Person who went to fetch water and/or holds in hands a container for liquid is seen in the moon

m78.name: Thumbling
m78.description: A childless couple (old woman, old man) gets for a son tiny boy as big as a thumb. He taunts people, predator animals, ogres

k13c.name: Ogress’ daughter avenges death of her mother
k13c.description: A man marries an ogress' daughter, kills her mother. The wife revenges on him, gets to cut off his leg

k7.name: “Like pubis of your wife”
k7.description: Hero compares something with pubis of another man's wife or sister. The insulted man maroons him in a tree or rock.

a32d.name: Man in the Moon
a32d.description: Human being or imprint of human being is seen in the moon

h4a.name: Process of rejuvenation is broken
h4a.description: People do not become young (usually do not shed their skin) anymore because certain person was bothered during rejuvenation or was not recognized by his family in his new guise

k72.name: Three maidens
k72.description: Powerful person listens in conversation of three or two women. Each one say what she would do if the person marries her. One promises to bear his son who would have wonderful qualities (or a son and a daughter), two others promise to practice some work or marry other people

i27b.name: Dog as a ferryman
i27b.description: A dog ferries person across a river that forms a border between the worlds

a38a.name: Snare of pubic hair
a38a.description: The Sun is caught into snare made of the pubic hair of hero's female relative

e39.name: Pig ancestor
e39.description: A pig is an ancestor of a particular group of people

m39b1.name: Paddling in both directions
m39b1.description: Persons sitting in a canoe paddle in opposite directions and the canoe does not move

l27.name: Girl eaten up
l27.description: Two girls or young women meet a demon. One or both are not aware of danger. One is eaten up, another escapes

k32i.name: Two sitters at the bed of a sleeping prince
k32i.description: A girl finds a body of a sleeping youth who will wake up at a certain time and marry  the girl who would sit nearby. Usually at the last moment the girl goes away for a time and the impostor takes her place.

e19.name: Origin of drugs: person torn to pieces
e19.description: Narcotic plants emerge from the body parts of a person who was torn to pieces by others

k139.name: Pheasant gets burnt
k139.description: Servant is roasting meat for his master but is so impressed with a girl’s beauty, that the meat gets burnt. The master comes himself and decides to marry the girl

b38a.name: Two birds paint each other
b38a.description: Two birds paint each other, one becomes worse than it was before

k27c.name: Ordeal: knives and thorns
k27c.description: An ordeal: to remain alive after contact with sharp points or blades

k33g.name: Fruits of two kinds
k33g.description: One who eats certain fruit (leave, etc.) gets horns (long nose, etc.) or turns into an animal. After eating another fruit (leave) person recovers his or her normal body

c16a.name: The offended mistress of animals
c16a.description: Mistress of animals or fish revives them after being offended

a11a.name: Eyes of the Sun and the Moon: coolness and night
a11a.description: Visible sun and/or moon are the Sun's and/or the Moon's eyes. If these eyes were not injured, light and heat would be more intense

b64.name: The bony fish
b64.description: Bones of fresh-water fish are result of a fighting or military expedition. The bones are arrows that have pierced the fish bodies (gill openings are pierced by arrows) or the small bones are fragments of originally big ones

m95.name: Brings presents to person’s kin
m95.description: A weaker person asks the stronger one to bring present to his or her kin and hides himself or herself in a bag. The stronger one brings the bag to the weaker one's relatives thinking that there are but some objects inside

a17.name: The Sun’s relax at the midday
a17.description: After passing half of the its way across the sky (in the day time) or in the underworld (in the night time), the Sun stops to have a rest

k29b.name: Posthole murder
k29b.description: Hero is asked to climb into a hole or pit. When he does it, they fill it with soil or throw down a post, a stone, etc. The hero demonstrates his magic capacities coming back uninjured

i46d.name: Rainbow snare
i46d.description: Rainbow is a snare, a noose

b79.name: Cosmic egg
b79.description: From the primeval egg, eggs, or egg-like ball emerge the earth, the sky, sky bodies, different animals (all or part of the items of this list)

m196.name: The silence wager
m196.description: A man and his wife make a wager: Whoever speaks first must do certain trivial work or get a bigger portion of some simple food. They or one of them continue to keep silence even being exposed to violence or taken by others as the dead

m187.name: Snail is a participant of the race
m187.description: Snail is a participant of the race and wins

k16a.name: Slips and drops dummy
k16a.description: Being eager to show that he is a successful hunter, a man walks in front of a girl carrying a game (deer, birds). The girl makes him slip, he drops the false game that proves to be a dummy stuffed with ashes or a termite nest

m115.name: The eaten up wolf
m115.description: Using a trick, person kills dangerous predator. Kinsmen and friends of the killed animal get to know about it and come to avenge its death. The person escapes from them

h7b.name: The Death in a tree
h7b.description: A man has a tree from which nobody can climb down without his will. He lures there Death or Devil who came after him

k38.name: Hero helps nestlings
k38.description: Person does good to nestlings of a powerful bird, the grateful mother bird helps him

h24c.name: Death in container
h24c.description: People open container with death or disease inside and become mortal

m132.name: Ears as sandals
m132.description: Enemy is ready to cease person who asks him first to throw away his clothes and shoes and exposes his ears. The enemy takes him by ears and throws away, the person escapes

i60a.name: Milky Way is a stripe on belly
i60a.description: Milky Way is a longitudinal streak, associated with a white line, stripe along the middle of a belly of an animal

h34d.name: Edible sky in the past
h34d.description: Sky or sky objects were edible or used as medicine but since the sky had separate from the earth this source of food became inaccessible. Inhabitants of the distant land where the sky and the earth come together feed on pieces of the sky

e5e.name: The two-headed one is not allowed to come to the earth
e5e.description: First people or animals ascend or descend to earth. The two-headed monster attempts to follow them but is prevented from coming to the earth

h48.name: Daughters of evil spirit
h48.description: Diseases are sisters (rare: brothers), usually children of evil spirit

l68.name: Two companions in the night
l68.description: Person turns into monster at night when he remains alone with his companion in the wilderness

b85.name: Wind pacified
b85.description: Wind is too strong and is pacified

m60a1.name: Herdsman explains how to ferry cattle
m60a1.description: To come unnoticed to his adversaries, the hero takes the guise of a herdsman and before that gets know from the real herdsman how to ferry the cattle across a river

b36b.name: Birds obtain their voices
b36b.description: Birds obtain their voices after pecking big reptile and smearing themselves with liquids from its body

k27p.name: Antagonist mourns loss of his helpers
k27p.description: The antagonist sends the hero to the place where he is attacked by dangerous creatures. The hero kills them and brings to the antagonist. The creatures are the antagonist's relatives, pets, or helpers, therefore he or she mourns their death or revives them

h39.name: The spilled poison
h39.description: Snakes drink liquid spilled on earth and become poisonous or immortal; creatures obtain their characteristics (usually becomes poisonous) after drinking or licking a particular medicine

i12.name: The world axis
i12.description: A tree or post pierces and unites different layers of the universe

k100c.name: Snake inside
k100c.description: Person (usually a young woman) does not know that a snake lives inside her or him and makes her or him ill or dangerous for other people. {Motif K100C is pretty similar to F9f1 but F9f1 links to a cluster of etiological/cosmological motifs related to the idea of a dangerous woman while K100c is related to adventures}

b90.name: Master of wolves
b90.description: There is an anthropomorphic patron or patroness of wolves. Usually he or she gives instructions to wolves on particular day of the year

k20.name: Wish for star-husband or wife realized
k20.description: A human person admires a star or (rare) the Moon in the sky, wishes for a star. The star descends to him or her or takes him or her to the sky

f82.name: Incest with mother-in-law
f82.description: A man uses a trick to have opportunity to make love to his mother-in-law or woman uses a trick to make love to her son-in-law. Usually a man takes with him on a hunt not his wife but her mother

m130b.name: Traitor killed instead of a victim
m130b.description: A herbivorous animal gets into hunter's trap. A predator animal refuses to free his companion because he hopes to feast on entrails. A bird makes the herbivorous animal free. The hunter tries to kill the bird but hits the predator instead

l59.name: Avaricious woman: metamorphosis
l59.description: Man's wife, sister or mother eats all the nest food alone, she is transformed in punishment

g4.name: A food mountain
g4.description: Cultivated plants are found above or inside a mountain

h27a.name: A hole in the ground
h27a.description: During the creation of the earth Creator's antagonist demands for himself as much earth as would be enough to put his staff. He thrusts the stake into the ground (rare: pulls out a certain pole). Insects and reptiles come out of the opening and/or the antagonist falls down through it into the underworld

i127.name: Ursa major is a bed
i127.description: Ursa major is a bed, a bedstead

j32.name: Brothers spy for night chief
j32.description: Somebody regularly steals valuables (horse, hay, apples, etc.). Brothers one by one spy for the thief but only the youngest surprises him

h36b.name: Death and the chameleon
h36b.description: Chameleon is responsible for introduction of permanent death

k32h.name: Punishment: buried alive
k32h.description: To punish an antagonist, he or she is buried alive

l33c.name: Rock crashes trickster
l33c.description: Trickster and rock agree to race down slope. The rock rolls with ever greater speed and crashes the trickster

d4b.name: Retribution for using fire
d4b.description: Person or people who have stolen fire or asked its owner to share the fire are punished by God

k25a2.name: Thrown down feathers
k25a2.description: Magic wife flies away or makes attempt to fly away when her bird relatives throw down her feathers (wings)

f51.name: Clandestine lover
f51.description: Person who conceals his or her identity comes to his or her lover at night. Next time, the lover puts a mark on the stranger's face, body or clothes doing this intentionally (to recognize him or her) or by chance (that leads to the identification)

l74.name: The returned hand
l74.description: A bear or other dangerous being tears off and carries away a hand of a person and holds it at his sleeping place. Another person steals the hand, gives it back to the owner

c37.name: World catastrophe and the sloth
c37.description: A sloth produces the world catastrophe or saves people from it

l24.name: Monsters suffocated
l24.description: Demons (or one of them) attack people and return to their den (usually a cave or tree hollow). People make suffocating fire around the den killing most or all of the demons

e22.name: Swallowed person obtains knowledge
e22.description: Getting into the body of certain being, person obtain knowledge of rituals, songs, ornaments, poison or drugs and then brings it to people

k64.name: Escape from Polyphemos’ cave
k64.description: Person gets into dwelling of master of animals or monstrous shepherd. The host can kill him. The hero escapes sticking to hair of one of the animals who are going out

i82a.name: Venus is male
i82a.description: Morning and/or Evening Star is a male personage

b98a.name: Bat and funerals
b98a.description: Bat is in conflict with other creatures because of the incident related to somebody's death or funerals

m153.name: Letter on a hoof
m153.description: A predator animal wants to eat a horse (mule, etc.). Before the horse will let himself be eaten, he demands (or another animal gives him advice) that the predator look at his hoof (for different reasons) or eat him from his hindquarters forward; then he kicks the predator

b81.name: Rifle for dog
b81.description: Creator and his opponent ponder upon should the dog be able to use a bow or fire-arms

b52c.name: Earth bigger than sky
b52c.description: When the earth and the sky were created, they p[roved to be of unequal size. The earth was squeezed, this way mountains appeared

h24f.name: Meat in a package
h24f.description: Putting a lot of meat or fish in a small package, person gives it to another warning him not to open it on the way. The warning is ignored, meat or fish falls out and cannot be put back

f38.name: Women and sacred knowledge
f38.description: Women were possessors of the sacred knowledge, sanctuaries or ritual objects which are now taboo for them or they made attempts to acquire such a knowledge or objects

m21a.name: Under pretext  of a toothache
m21a.description: Person is pursued by an enemy. A bird or animal hides him or her in its mouth (under a wing) and  pretends not to be able to open the mouth (to raise a wing) because of a tooth ache, some injury and the like

c30A.name: A pound of flesh
c30A.description: A contract entitles the lender of a sum of money to cut a certain amount of flesh (or eye, head, limb, etc.) from the debtor’s body if the load is not repaid in time. The lender cannot cut out the flesh being unable to fulfill a condition that looks logical but is practically absurd

f28a.name: Primeval penis
f28a.description: There is only one monstrous penis, a husband of primeval women or the amazons, usually growing out of earth or out of water in a lake

i121.name: Ursa major and Ursa minor as twin constellations
i121.description: Constellations of Ursa major and Ursa minor are interpreted as twin objects of the same type (two animals, two carts, etc.)

a32c.name: A man and a dog in the Moon
a32c.description: A human being and a dog together are seen in the moon

a23a.name: Who will see the Sun first?
a23a.description: Two persons or animals argue about who of them will be the first to see the rising sun. One who seemed to have less chances wins

b55.name: Leaves are fish
b55.description: Fish grows on branches of a tree or leaves of a tree turn into fish

a32j.name: A shaman in the moon
a32j.description: A shaman with his drum ascends to the moon and remains there, his figure is seen in the moon

i80.name: Thunder’s apprentice
i80.description: Person gets to the house of Thunder, becomes his servant and breaking certain taboo or instructions, produces extensive thunderstorm or rain

j51.name: One piece is missing
j51.description: Person or animal is eaten up or destroyed otherwise. His bones are put together and he or it is revived. Because one bone was broken, swallowed or lost, the person or animal cannot be revived or being revived misses some part of his or its body

h34c.name: Flying rice
h34c.description: Rice could flow arriving by itself to the household

a18.name: The sky boats
a18.description: The Sun and/or the Moon regularly travel across the sky or the underworld in a boat. (Voyages by boat of the mythical persons who eventually become the Sun or the Moon not included)

i42.name: Rainbow is a pair of creatures
i42.description: Rainbow is two creatures or persons, usually a male and a female

b100.name: Getting a sleep
b100.description: Formerly or in a particular country the sleep was not known;

m2.name: Riding down a tree
m2.description: A man descends from top of a tree or rock down a chain of animals or on the back of an animal who climbs or runs down the trunk

b19.name: The night and the married life
b19.description: People had trouble making love before night came into being

h14.name: Woman flies back to the land of the dead
h14.description: A dead woman returns to earth but flies back as a bird or a fly

j52a.name: Bear as antagonist
j52a.description: A bear-person (usually Bear-woman) kills her or his female companion who is associated with a weaker animal – not a predator or a weaker predator. The victim's children revenge on the antagonist killing her own children and / or run away and escape

d1.name: Female spirit of fire
d1.description: Fire is personified as an (elder) woman, alone or with her husband, master of fire

i110a.name: The star plough
i110a.description: Orion (rare: other constellation) is a plough

k114.name: Brothers leave home after their sister is born
k114.description: Several brothers leave home immediately after their mother gives birth to a girl. Usually they do not want to have another brother and hope that this time a girl will be born but chance or by evil intent a signal is given that not a girl but a boy is born again. The brothers are disappointed and leave, the girl grows up and travels in search of them

k70.name: Two wives: the woman and the frog
k70.description: One brother takes a girl, another a frog or toad for a wife, both bring them to their parents, or one man takes two wives, a woman and a frog. Both wives are suggested to pass a test. The girl’s behavior is approved, the frog’s poor qualities are revealed

j47a.name: Beanstalk to the sky
j47a.description: A bean or a pea grows up to the sky and a person climbs by it there

m96.name: Imagined guests
m96.description: Person does not want to share his meal with his close relatives and pretending to have many guests, eats food alone

b9.name: Water in the tree trunk
b9.description: There is enormous amount of water inside a trunk of a tree or a tree turns into water

i15a.name: A vertical cut
i15a.description: Mouth of human being was first cut vertically

k32b.name: Mother substitutes daughterMother takes the appearance of her daughter to replace her

l90.name: Mouth from the earth to the sky
l90.description: Monster's upper lip (fang, horn, etc.) touches the sky, lower touches the ground

f5a.name: Artificial bride
f5a.description: Person has to give his daughter or sister in marriage. Having no woman to suggest or not wanting to give her, he makes artificial girl (of wood, snow, etc.), sends servant girl instead daughter, turns into woman himself, or recognizes his fault when he feels that it is save to do so

l19b.name: Multi-headed being
l19b.description: A being with three or more heads is described in tales or represented in art

b36c.name: Fat animals
b36c.description: Animals get meat and fat extracted from some original creature or created otherwise. Some get a lot, some remain lean

k27y.name: To get material for making bow and arrows
k27y.description: Hero is sent or sets off by his own will to get two or more different materials needed for making bow and arrows (wood or reed for shafts, feathers, tendons for string, flint for points, paint to paint the shafts, gum to stick points to the shafts)

l96.name: Sold in animal’s guise and comes back
l96.description: Person can transform himself or herself into an animal or an object. Being sold in this guise, he or she achieves his or her aims and becomes a human again

h49.name: Pet defends master’s child
h49.description: A dog or other animal or bird kills dangerous creature who was going to attack the pet's master or his child. The master thinks that the assailant was the pet, kills it, then regrets his deed

k120.name: The averted incest
k120.description: A man is going to marry his daughter or sister (often puts certain condition on his future marriage, only his daughter or sister complies with them). The girl gets to escape

a4a.name: The Sun dazzles eyes
a4a.description: Modest Sun-woman dazzles (usually pricks with needles, i.e. the sun rays) eyes of those who look at her

b7b.name: Waters from broken pot
b7b.description: Sea, river, waters of flood flow out of a small container

c19a.name: Child plays with the sun
c19a.description: Persons (usually Raven) turns into child, asks and receives to play luminaries or comes to play with a small daughter of the owner of the luminaries

k61a.name: To get know a secret
k61a.description: To get know the precise number of certain units, to select certain object among many others, to get know a name of particular person or a reason of particular phenomenon, person tries to surprise the possessor of the knowledge who becomes to speak aloud and unintentionally names the corresponding number, specifies the object, etc.

i36.name: Thunder and lightning are two siblings
i36.description: Two siblings turn into thunder and lightning or into two thunders or one turns into thunder, another into an animal

k124.name: There was a greater wonder!
k124.description: An animal killed by a hunter revives. The animal itself or somebody else tells the hunter that there was a greater wonder with such and such a person. The story follows

f50.name: The often-born children
f50.description: Child or children come out of mother's womb and return back

b38b.name: Raven and loon paint each other
b38b.description: Raven and loon paint each other

i85c.name: Vessels with weather
i85c.description: Person gets to the sky and finds there several vessels with different kinds of weather, precipitations, times of the year and the like

m125.name: Eaten up eyes
m125.description: Person lies to another that he is eating his eyes. The companion agrees to be blinded. The first person extracts one of companion’s eye but gives him to eat something delicious instead. The companion believes that his eyes are good to eat and agrees to be deprived of another eye too

i113.name: Pig with the golden bristle
i113.description: A pig made of gold or having golden bristles is a treasure

i33.name: Tree of the dead
i33.description: The ultimate aim of the afterlife journey is to reach certain tree

b35.name: Waddling bear
b35.description: Being in a hurry, the bear puts his left shoe on his right foot and vice versa. Now is lumbering

h47.name: Offended sky or earth
h47.description: The sky (or the earth) is offended by people’s behavior in respect to it and reacts accordingly (e.g. rises higher than it was before)

c6a.name: The diver is turtle or frog
c6a.description: A turtle, a frog, a toad, or an armadillo brings the desired object from the bottom of the water body or from the lower world

a3.name: Male sun and female moon
a3.description: The Moon is female or bisexual, the Sun is male

j51a.name: Ladder made of limbs of a girl
j51a.description: To help a man to ascend a rock, a girl tells him to cut her into pieces, make a ladder of her limbs, then put them together again. The girl revives but a finger is missing

m70.name: An elder person poisons a younger one with intestinal gas
m70.description: Old person tricks a young man into smelling her or his intestinal gas

m152c.name: The donkey and the lion crossing a river
m152c.description: A weak companion of a big predator pretends to be strong and brave. Almost drowned сrossing a river and saved by the predator, he pretends to be angry (“Because of you I let a fish go”, etc.)

b33d.name: The old woman of winter
b33d.description: Old woman is incarnation of winter or there are several cold days between winter and spring (or fall) associated with a certain old woman

l88.name: Ogre returns to life
l88.description: A man kills an ogre. When he later comes and touches the ogre's remains, the latter revives

l100.name: Transformation flight
l100.description: A youth and a girl who run away from pursuer transform themselves into a pair of persons, creatures or objects (pond and duck, church and priest, etc.) in order to escape detection by the pursuer

j7.name: The changed signs
j7.description: A woman or a girl is in search of her husband, fiancé or kinsmen. She loses her way because certain person changed signs at the crossroad

k5.name: The fake nestlings
k5.description: To lure the hero into a trap or to send him far away, the antagonist makes a bird or nestlings of excrements or guts

m137.name: The wolf imitates the Lion
m137.description: The stronger predator demonstrates the weaker one the right way to behave before attacking the game.. The weaker one does the same (eyes are bloody, hindquarters trembling, etc.) but instead of killing a herbivorous animal is usually killed himself

k35a.name: Hero brands his rivals
k35a.description: Person who is an excellent food provider or warrior agrees to let the others material proves of his exploits (the killed game, etc.) for the right to brand them or injure their bodies in a certain way or to take from them objects that they should not give off

b38.name: The ruined painting
b38.description: Person paints birds or animals or they paint each other. It is made not according to the original plan

a32e.name: Person with an object in hands
a32e.description: Person who holds some object in his or her hands is seen in the moon

m24.name: Turtle’s war party
m24.description: Turtle goes to war and/or is captured by enemies

k56a6.name: Food asks to be eaten
k56a6.description: On the way to the non-human world objects ask a child to taste certain food or to fulfill some work. The child does what was asked and is rewarded

m76.name: Person climbs a tree, leg is cut off
m76.description: When a man climbs a tree, a woman cuts his leg off or when a woman climbs a tree, a man cuts her leg off

h43aa.name: Figure of the first man smeared with filth
h43aa.description: After making human body, creator goes away for a time. In his absence another person spits on the human figure that was not yet alive, smears it with filth, etc.

a12f.name: Eclipses: creditor
a12f.description: A creditor comes from time to time to the Sun or the Moon to claim back his money producing eclipses

k42.name: Bird-woman kills men (The loon-woman)
k42.description: Bird-woman is energetically searching a man whom she likes, takes him by force for her husband. Turning into a monster, she kills men but is ultimately destroyed

c19.name: Acquisition of the sun
c19.description: The primeval ancestors acquire with difficulty the hidden or stolen sun or daylight. (for computing all cases for motif C19A are included into C19)

d4a.name: Theft of fire
d4a.description: Fire is stolen from its original owner or brought back to the people from somebody who had stolen it before

k43b.name: Bird brings some meat
k43b.description: People abandon a boy, a girl, brother and sister, a group of children, or a young family without fire and food. The outlaws demonstrate supernatural powers or protectors providing food and lodging. While the abandoned persons have plenty of food other people starve. A person (often a bird like crow, magpie, sea-gull, etc.) visits the abandoned ones and brings from them some food home. This way people get to know that the abandoned ones prosper

k141.name: Tamed injurious fairies
k141.description: Every one of three supernatural sisters makes harm to people. Hero overcomes them and usually marries them

m60.name: Sham doctor: finished off enemy
m60.description: Hero wounds monstrous enemy, then masks as a doctor, kills his patient instead of curing him

m120b.name: Baby-sitter kills babies of bear-mother
m120b.description: Trickster sends a woman (usually bear-woman) or two women to pick up berries or an animal allegedly killed by him and suggests to look after their children. He kills the children, feeds their meat to their mother. (The false baby-sitter kills the cabs not because he is hungry and not because of his carelessness)

l42f.name: Prisoner escapes, wife is killed
l42f.description: Person that has to be eaten up imperceptibly runs away. The master of the house thinks that his wife had eaten the food alone and cuts her belly open

b3.name: A primeval swamp
b3.description: Initially the earth is a swamp, water and dry land are not separated from each other

l118.name: Caught in a split log
l118.description: (Animal) person provokes another to put his hand or paw into a split log, between two planks, etc. When a wedge is removed, two pieces of wood spring back together and the person or animal gets caught

i5a.name: Thunderous tapir
i5a.description: Tapir is associated with the upper world, usually with the thunder

f17.name: Misplaced genitalia
f17.description: Women or men originally had or had to have their genitals not on the place where they are now

l28a.name: Eating of snake meat triggers flood
l28a.description: A river or lake appear or a flood begins because certain person ate meat of a snake or a strange fish

b42s.name: Hit with a projectile
b42s.description: Ursa major or Polaris are identified with a middle size animal (ermine, fisher, woodchuck) or person (identified with an animal?) hit with a dart or arrow

c15.name: The imprisoned feline
c15.description: Monstrous puma or jaguar is imprisoned in a cave or tree trunk

h7c.name: Not finished prayer
h7c.description: Death promises to take a man after he has finished a prayer. The man begins to pray but does not finish his prayer and the Death cannot take him

a41.name: The Sun swallows her children
a41.description: Two persons have children (younger siblings, mothers). One of them proposes to another that they should kill (eat, bake, etc.) their children (mothers, etc.) but hides his or her own. The opponent actually kills his or her own kin. One of the persons or/and the only survived child is the Sun

m53e.name: Would believe evil omen
m53e.description: Person (always a raven) kills a whale. When people come, he tells them about some circumstances that can make the meat dangerous. People do not dare to touch the meat and the deceiver eats it alone

l93b.name: Helpful rabbit
l93b.description: Cunning rabbit or hare saves person, helps him or her

l114b1.name: A task: to bring the ogre
l114b1.description: Person bring objects from ogre’s house and after this catches or kill the ogre himself

j28b.name: A hot scone
j28b.description: A youth gets to know that a woman (usually his mother) conceals from him important information about his father, brothers or bride. He causes her pain (usually putting hot scone, handful of hot grain, etc. into her hand) making her tell him the truth

m16.name: Ugly or sick becomes healthy and handsome
m16.description: A wife, bride or mother of a sick or ugly boy or man does not care for him. He becomes healthy and handsome, punishes and/or abandons her

b82.name: The white raven
b82.description: Raven or other carrion-eating bird of dark color and a similar size was originally white

f77a.name: Penis bridge
f77a.description: Huge penis is used as a bridge across water body

a39a.name: The new sun every day
a39a.description: Suns are born and die every day

k1d.name: Woman’s brothers maroon her husband
k1d.description: Brothers of a man's wife hate him and maroon on an islet

l43.name: Ogre eats filth
l43.description: Hero escapes from ogre's trap or hides in a shelter. The ogre or ogress roasts and/or eats insects, snakes, excrements, etc. being sure that he or she eats the man

f4.name: Child born in jug
f4.description: In the beginning of times, a particular person or children in general was or were conceived and grown up in pots, heaps of mud, etc. and not in a womb

k37a.name: To recognize a man
k37a.description: Person must recognize her (or his) son or husband among several identical persons or (if the son or husband is temporarily transformed) animals

j66.name: The bitten through bow-strings
j66.description: Hero or his helpers cut or gnaw through bow- and other strings of the enemies, make holes in their canoes, making the enemies unable to fight or to pursue the hero

k22a.name: Dwarfs attacked
k22a.description: Birds or other creatures which not dangerous for common people attack dwarfs who live in another world

m83c.name: Who becomes drunk easier?
m83c.description: Animals argue who of them gets drunk easier. The last one falls down because he becomes drunk as soon as somebody talks about alcohol

b50.name: Bloodsuckser’s lie
b50.description: An insect feeds on human blood (flesh). Dangerous person asks it where it got to suck blood or whose blood (flesh) is the most delicious. The insect lies or cannot answer (its tongue is cut off). Thanks to this dangerous person attacks certain plants or animals and not people

l123.name: Running in many directions
l123.description: To confuse pursuer, person many times runs away in different directions and comes back

j47.name: Pursuer falls from height
j47.description: Person ascends to the sky (rare: descends from the sky; ascends the cliff) by a rope, a ladder, etc. Another person tries to follow him or her but the rope (the ladder) is broken or severed

k56a8.name: Swallowed by boa
k56a8.description: A girl marries an animal or brings an animal to her home that turns into a handsome man. Her sister or friend tries to do the same but perishes or suffers a reverse

d6a.name: Fire and crocodile
d6a.description: Crocodile or cayman is an original or temporary owner of fire or lighting

l92.name: Animal shams being helpful
l92.description: Person escapes to a tree or high rock. An ogre tries to cut it down. An animal suggests the ogre to have a rest, promises to work instead of him but spoils his work

m46a.name: Picked up baby
m46a.description: Person turns into baby, is picked up by the owner of valuables, steal the valuables or make love to a woman

l30.name: Eating of snake meat triggers thirst
l30.description: Person who breaks some sort of taboo (usually has eaten a prohibited food) is thirsty and drinks enormous quantity of water

e4.name: Creation from cuticle
e4.description: Supernatural person rubs his or her skin, creates the entire earth, human or other beings of dirt and cuticle

m6.name: Night with a partridge
m6.description: A young man or girl spends night in the forest. The forest partridge (Tinamus sp.) provides him or her a fire, a shelter and/or a hammock but takes them away and flies away itself when the person does something wrong

k49.name: Dead mother returns to nurse her baby
k49.description: Dead or driven away woman returns to the human world to her baby that needs mother's care

h21.name: Animals or fish kill a child
h21.description: Person possesses game animals or fish. A boy or a girl knows this secret or is used as a luring device. Another person asks or forces the boy or girl to serve him the same way or the boy himself makes an attempt to hunt or fish. As a result, the boy or girl is killed or carried away by animals or fish

h6bb.name: The lost objects
h6bb.description: Animal person is sent to pass to the people certain objects or substance but loses or replaces them. Because of this people miss possibility to become immortal or their life becomes difficult

f10.name: Teeth knocked out
f10.description: Woman has another toothed mouth (usually in vagina) or biting animals in vagina. Man inserts there a stone, bone, stick, etc. breaking or knocking out the teeth or extracting from there dangerous animals

k38b1.name: Bird steals colts, hero kills the serpent
k38b1.description: Every time when a horse gives birth to wonderful colts, they are stolen by a giant bird. A hero goes to get the colts and kills a serpent that regularly devours nestlings of the giant bird

b42i.name: The object of cosmic hunt is the Lady in the Chair
b42i.description: The object of hunt in the cosmic hunt tale is identified with the Lady in the Chair

k75a.name: Thrown apple hits the chosen one
k75a.description: Boy or girl selects one person among many throwing an object (usually an apple) into him or her. This way a girl makes a choice of a husband, a young man of a bride, a boy identifies his father

a2d.name: Suns of the other worlds
a2d.description: Different suns illuminate different worlds or will appear successively in the future

k67.name: Burned moccasins
k67.description: Two men spend a night in a forest, take their moccasins or clothes off usually to dry them near the fire. One plans to burn the moccasins or the clothes of another at night. The latter imperceptible interchange their things and the first man burns his own property

k27.name: Competitions and difficult tasks
k27.description: Person is suggested to fulfill tasks that are mortally dangerous or cannot be fulfilled without supernatural helpers or capacities. The person fulfills the tasks and remains alive. A contest between persons has form of a competition or game in which the loser is deprived of his status or life

i21.name: Red-haired people scorched by the sun
i21.description: People who live in the underworld, at the sunrise or sunset (often dwarfs) are scorched by the Sun which moves by at a short distance from them. They are red-haired, dark-skinned, etc.

k18.name: Infant picks out his unknown father
k18.description: To get know who is the father or (rare) mother of a small boy, many people come together. Everybody is eager to be recognized as the boy's parent but the boy points at his real father or mother

k27x3.name: The man persecuted because of his beautiful bride
k27x3.description: A powerful person coverts a beautiful bride or wife of a man and gives him impossible tasks to get rid of him

j12d.name: Imposter kills his rival
j12d.description: After a girl marries a valuable suitor, a rejected imposter or his relations kill him

l63.name: Person eats with vagina or anus
l63.description: Person eats food with her toothed vagina or her or his toothed anus

m171.name: The successive exchange: from a pea to a horse
m171.description: Person or animal stays for a night and the next morning declares that his possessions (which value is none or negligible) are lost. He receives in compensation objects (usually a domestic animal) that has a bigger value, and this way several times till he gets a really valuable animal or a human person

m39a6b.name: King the craftsman
m39a6b.description: A poor girl agrees to marry a prince only if he learns some craft. He does it, marries the girl and then gets into hands of some criminals. He promises them to produce valuable object that they can sell for good money. His wife or (rare) his father recognize his work (or read signs of the object). He is released, the criminals killed

m8.name: Breaking the obstacle
m8.description: Non-human persons work hard to destroy a strong and durable obstacle that blocks access to some place or object

m62a.name: Quarrel provoked by action
m62a.description: Hero imperceptibly causes detriment to two persons or creatures. They accuse each other and fight

l83.name: Incomplete body turns into thunder
l83.description: A rolling head or a man who has burned off his foot turns into or produces thunder or lightning

i123.name: Altair is the Sun’s messenger
i123.description: Altair or Vega with a weak nearby star are believed to appear on the sky immediately after winter solstice though really it is not so

a1.name: The old sun
a1.description: Another sun, usually less benevolent and/or powerful, existed before the present one

l85d.name: One leg and one arm: the injured ploughman
l85d.description: Hero comes across a giant (usually a ploughman) with one leg, one arm, one eye. The latter was injured when he met another giant who was much bigger and stronger than he

i37e.name: Fungi are steps, platforms, obstacles
i37e.description: Tree fungi are steps, small platforms, umbrellas, obstacles that make moving easier or more difficult, provide a shelter or cover

d4c1.name: Swimming elk diverts attention
d4c1.description: Animal-people come to steal summer from its owner. One of them in guise of an elk or caribou diverts the owners' attention or puts to float a log that the owner takes for an elk and pursues. The summer is successfully stolen and brought to the people

k77c.name: Ones who hide in a house frighten dangerous enemy
k77c.description: Objects and/or domestic animals live in a house. When dangerous enemy comes, they attack him, he dies or escapes (all texts with K77A and K77B included)

k77a.name: Small objects and animals defeat the ogre
k77a.description: Small objects and animals (rare: animals alone but including harmless and passive ones, e.g. on the dry land fishes) revenge on a powerful enemy making attack on him in succession (usually they hide in his or her house); the enemy is badly injured, runs away or dies

k27L1.name: To be frozen in ice
k27L1.description: An adversary of the hero agrees to test his strength being frozen in ice

f80.name: Primeval people have no genitals
f80.description: The first men and/or women have no genitals

l15a.name: Vulnerable limb (Achilles’ heel)
l15a.description: The only vulnerable spot of some being's body is his (her, its) limb (knee, toe, finger, etc.)

g22.name: Frog or toad and plants
g22.description: Frog or toad is related to acquisition of cultivated plants

j15a.name: Woman gets to jaguars
j15a.description: Setting off (usually in search of her husband, boyfriend or kinsmen), woman gets to the place of dangerous felines

j67.name: Stones on eyes
j67.description: At night person puts light stones or shells on his eyes. The antagonist believes that his eyes are opened and does not dare to attack

a46.name: The Sun and Moon from eyes of a being
a46.description: The Sun and Moon (Rig-Veda: the Sun only) appear from eyes of a person or creature

c4.name: The flood: fruits fall from a tree
c4.description: During the flood or in the beginning of times fruits, seeds or other objects are dropped into water one by one, usually by a person who has climbed a tree. As far as the objects fall, water recedes and the dry land appears

c30.name: Impracticable condition
c30.description: To get rid of his obligations, person puts for others an impracticable condition

b47a.name: Split hood of cow
b47a.description: Cow steps on the stars of the Pleiades which were dangerous being and lived on earth. Some of these stars slipped through its split hoof

m54.name: Runway awakes in the same house
m54.description: A man runs away from the house of powerful person but in the morning awakens in the same house again

i11.name: Cosmic turtle or toad
i11.description: A turtle, toad, or frog supports the earth or is its embodiment

b15.name: River from woman’s body
b15.description: A river flows from the body of a female person

k92.name: King Lear
k92.description: A man puts his children questions that seem easy to answer (how they love him, who is the elder in the family, etc.). The elder children flatter, the youngest daughter (rare: son) is reserved and her father drives her away or deprives of inheritance. Later her noble nature becomes evident to him

i20b.name: Belt on armpits
i20b.description: People in the upper world are different than on earth and put their belts not on the waist but higher or below it

l100c.name: Faithful wife mocks men who come to buy her love
l100c.description: A woman pretends to be a prostitute. When a man comes to her she uses magic and the man spends all the night in her room being unable to move from the place. Episode is repeated with other or (rare) the same suitor. Usually the first suitor is ashamed, tells the other ones that everything was nice, and they are humiliated the same way

k4.name: The bird nester
k4.description: Person climbs up a tree or rock or descends to a cave to get eggs or nestlings from the bird's nest. Another person remains on the ground. They get into conflict and/or the first person is unable to get back to the ground

f93.name: The talking penis
f93.description: A man's member speaks and can be silenced only by his mother-in-law

f18b.name: Penis crawls to women
f18b.description: Man's penis is so long that he can turn it round his waist or send into a woman who is at a long distance from him

e9h.name: Dove-wife
e9h.description: A man marries dove-woman or a woman marries dove-man; supernatural woman or man takes form of a dove

j50.name: An attempt to revive the victim
j50.description: Twin heroes' parent dies or is killed, an attempt to revive him or her fails

b46.name: Ursa major as seven men
b46.description: Every star of the Ursa mayor is a separate person. Usually the constellation represents seven men, rare it is seven women or seven persons and animals

a2b1.name: The last sun
a2b1.description: Two or more suns shine in the sky. When the extra suns had been annihilated, there was a risk of the last one being destroyed too

m27.name: Coming back from the sky
m27.description: A tree or a chain of reeds by which people have ascended to the sky is destroyed. On their way back they fall to the ground. Some of them remain in the sky for ever or longer than others

h12a.name: Dead woman pursues her husband
h12a.description: Wife dies, husband comes after her or he kills his untrue wife. The dead wife turns into monster and pursues him

m33.name: Anus closed
m33.description: Person himself or somebody else stitches up or firmly stops his anus (with wax, clay, grass, etc.)

k30.name: Flying enemy abducts woman
k30.description: Flying person or creature abducts a woman but is ultimately killed or the woman escapes from him

m184.name: The slow one is ahead of the sleeping one
m184.description: A slow and a fast animals agree to race. The fast one is sure that he will win and is not in a hurry at all while the slow one is moving persistently to his aim and wins

k97.name: Now you are grieved as I was
k97.description: A man is going to kill but spares a giant bird. Later when the bird carries him high in the air he pretends to drop him or to abandon him on a rock. This way the bird wants him to feel the same terror that he felt when the man was going to kill him. Or it is the bird that first drops and picks up a man who later makes the bird feel a similar terror

f9f1.name: Snake inside woman
f9f1.description: Poisonous snake (snakes, scorpions) comes out of the mouth of a woman {Motif F9f1 and K100c are almost identical but F9f1 links to a cluster of etiological/cosmological motifs related to the idea of a dangerous woman while K100c is related to adventures}

d1a2.name: The borrowed object is not burned
d1a2.description: House of a person who insulted the fire is destroyed but an object or a child of another person who was nice to the fire has not been burned though it was in the house of the first person

e5c.name: People from the sky
e5c.description: The first people or first anthropomorphic divine beings descend to earth from the sky.

e15.name: Ducks and canoes
e15.description: People learn from aquatic birds how to make canoes or how to paddle; or the first canoe is a transformed bird or is made of bird bones

f11.name: Biting penis
f11.description: Penis is biting, stinging, eats food

c6.name: The diver
c6.description: Persons or animals dive to get something from the bottom of the water body

b38d.name: Raven and owl paint each other
b38d.description: Raven and owl paint each other

l37b.name: Secrets accidentally overheard
l37b.description: Person accidentally overhears secrets of animals or demons and thus gets to know the causes of his and other people's misfortunes

k9.name: God’s wife thrown down from the sky
k9.description: The sky chief discovers or thinks that his wife, sister or lover is untrue or incestuous. He throws her down from the sky. She becomes the mistress of the lower or middle world or a part of it or one of her sons gets power over the lower world

j65.name: Sun’s children destroy the enemies
j65.description: A lonely woman with her daughter are the only survivors after enemies' attack. The woman rejects a series of animal-persons who come to ask her daughter in marriage but accept a sky-person for her son-in-law. Children of the sky-person and woman's daughter revenge on the enemies

a2c.name: Extra suns are children of the present one
a2c.description: Extra suns who almost burned or could burn the world are children of the present one

b42h.name: The object of cosmic hunt is the Belt of Orion
b42h.description: The object of hunt in the cosmic hunt tale is identified with the Belt of Orion

m62e.name: One field and two workers
m62e.description: A weak person makes a separate agreement with two strong ones to cultivate a field. The strong ones do not know about each other, and ultimately the weak one takes all the harvest himself.

l73.name: Ogre persuaded to drink a river dry bursts
l73.description: A pursuer is advised to drink a river or sea. He or she tries to do it and bursts

i98a.name: The Pleiades are a hen with its chickens
i98a.description: The Pleiades are a brooding hen, hen with its chickens, chickens

m71.name: Picked up piece of wood
m71.description: Trickster floats down the river or falls from the height and turns into a piece of wood or into a wooden object. Somebody picks it up. Eventually, the trickster acquires his real self, usually in the host's absence

a38b.name: Mouse gnaws snare open
a38b.description: After the Sun is caught into snare only mouse, shrew or other small animal is able to cut it open

m29m.name: Trickster is a rat
m29m.description: In episodes related to deception, absurd, obscene or anti-social behavior the protagonist is a rat

j52b.name: Hare-woman or hare-children as heroes
j52b.description: A girl, a young woman, or children who are associated with a hare or rabbit are heroes of the story

l102.name: Escape from animal husband
l102.description: Seriously of for fun, a girl or a woman names an animal or remains of an animal as her husband or steps on the animal’s bones. The animal (revives and) carries her away. Her human husband or brother comes after her and they run away. Usually the animal husband pursues them but abandons the chase or dies

f32.name: Tree fruits for a woman
f32.description: Baby child or children who come out of mother's womb and turn themselves into adult men or a snake who lives in her womb climb up a tree and help the woman to gather fruits, bark, edible fungi, etc. Usually the child who is a snake returns to his mother's womb and adult man turns back into a baby; or the girl's love affair with a snake is discovered when her father climbs a tree to gather fruits for her

l74a.name: Hung over fire
l74a.description: An antagonist carries away the hero or rips off and carries away his limb and hangs the prisoner or the limb (usually over the fire). The hero is suffering from pain. Another personage saves the hero or brings his limb back

k45.name: Sedna (fingers cut off)
k45.description: A man throws a woman into the water. She tries to snatch at something, he cuts her fingers off. Usually the woman or/and the cut off fingers turn into water creatures

m197.name: The effectiveness of fire
m197.description: Seriously or demonstrating absurdity of the situation, a person tries to cook something using a fire (a source of light) that is far away from the object to be cooked

m90a1.name: The louse skin
m90a1.description: It should be guessed the nature of a big animal or its skin, the content of a box. The correct answer is that the animal is a louse (o flea), a louse is in the box

m47.name: Head put to bottoms
m47.description: Punishing a person or animal or restoring his or its body after its disin­teg­ration, a powerful being intentionally or by chance puts head to bottoms

c5a.name: Bird-scouts
