i105.name: The celestial hand
i105.description: One of constellations represents a hand with fingers

b45.name: Marriage of winter and summer
b45.description: A coming of warm (light, abundant, etc.) or cold (dark, barren, etc.) time is related to the marriage of certain person

k109.name: A puppy turns into wife
k109.description: A man is advised to ask for his service rendered to a powerful being a puppy or a small object (a beaker). The puppy or object turns into beautiful girl who is a daughter of a deity. Other person makes attempts to take the woman away

m101.name: Who is afraid of whom? (Fox and Bear)
m101.description: Fox tells that he is afraid of people, Bear tells that he is afraid of partridges. Fox hunts partridges, Bear attacks people and is wounded or killed

c8.name: The primeval couple of siblings
c8.description: In the beginning of time or after the world catastrophe brother and sister or mother and son are the only humans. They marry each other, present people descend from them

k122.name: Queen of other world comes to identify hero
k122.description: Hero gets to the powerful woman who lives in another world, then returns to the world of humans. Imposter claims hero's deeds for himself. The powerful woman comes and finds the real hero, usually punishes the imposter

h6c.name: The immortal raven
h6c.description: Raven is contrasted with people as an immortal with mortals (usually is sent to bring water of immortality or drinks itself water of immortality)

i14.name: No-anus people
i14.description: Person or creature has no anus opening

k100e.name: Aggressive stories
k100e.description: Stories become harmful because they think that a certain person does not treat them in a correct way

l100a.name: A pursuer throws ahead the transformed fugitive
l100a.description: A fugitive turns into small object (stick, stone) or hides himself inside it. A pursuer picks it up and throws ahead in anger, thus unwillingly helping the fugitive to escape

e9aa.name: Fox-wife in animals’ den
e9aa.description: In search of his lost fox-wife man comes to a den. Different animal- or bird-women come out and ask him if he would mary them. He refuses and they let him in

j59.name: Following arrow gets to the sky
j59.description: To climb to the sky, person needs first to shoot an arrow that would reach the sky and stick into it

l65b.name: Dogs save their master
l65b.description: A demonic woman or (rare) her paramour or a monster is going to kill a man usually after driving him up a tree. At the last moment the man's dogs or other animals or birds who are the man's pets come and kill the demon

l57b.name: Demon comes to get his body part back
l57b.description: Person cuts off and uses part of the body of demonic creature. The demon comes after it, kills or maims the person

l65c.name: Cannibal elder sister
l65c.description: The eldest of three or more sisters becomes a cannibal and devours her sisters and other people

b1c.name: One creator deceives another
b1c.description: Two creators agree that whose object will be found in a certain condition (usually: whose tree or flower will grow or blossom first) should be recognized as a senior one. While one of the creators sleeps or is absent, another replaces the objects and so achieves the priority by deceit

m109b.name: Sick animal carries the healthy one
m109b.description: A healthy animal tricks an injured one (a wolf, a bear) into carrying him on his back by pretending to be injured himself

l108c.name: The white hand
l108c.description: To make himself unrecognizable by the victim, a predator or ogre demonstrates clothes, limb, etc. that look like clothes or limb of his victim's mother, etc.

k87a.name: A stolen boy
k87a.description: A forest woman receives or steals a small boy and brings him up to make him her paramour

j57.name: Son of the Sun
j57.description: A virgin girl is impregnated by the Sun and gives birth to a son or twin boys. When her son (or the twins) grows up, he (they) comes to his father

h28.name: Plagues from the body of a person or creature
h28.description: Killed and destroyed (often burned) person or creature (usually ogre, fierce animal, powerful shaman) turns into a multitude of biting insects or into other small molesting creatures

f64.name: The lecherous parent
f64.description: Person changes his or (rare) her guise to marry his or her close relative in descending or (rare) ascending line

l15g.name: A burned piece of wood (Meleagros’ death)
l15g.description: Life of a man depends on a wooden object. When a woman burns it down, the man dies

l46.name: Head downward
l46.description: Person ascends, descends, walks head downward or sees the world upside down

a12.name: Eclipses: a monster’s attack
a12.description: Some creature or creatures regularly (sunrise and sunset, summer and winter, lunar phases) or irregularly (solar and lunar eclipses, eschatological events) attack the luminaries or shade their light

m151.name: Hello, house!
m151.description: Dangerous animal pretends to be an inanimate object, dead or absent. The potential victim sais aloud that the real dead (object, place) has to act in a particular way or to say particular words. The animal does accordingly betraying himself.

h7a.name: The Death and a doctor
h7a.description: Man receives from Death (Fortune, some spirit) knowledge will the patient recover or die. He becomes a doctor and receives rich rewards. Usually he gets the ability to see Death near the bed of a patient and considering a particular place where Death stands, gets to know perspectives of recovering

e5.name: Half-made man attempts to stand up
e5.description: God makes the first man of clay. The man must wait till he is dried up but makes attempts to stand up before time

j5.name: Brothers as victims
j5.description: Two or several brothers or friends are killed by antagonists. One of them is the father of the young hero who avenges their death or all of them are his uncles

k8aa.name: Jonah: swallowed by bird
k8aa.description: Person gets into the belly of a giant bird. He kills it from the inside and/or returns to earth by himself (i.e. not extracted by other people)

g19.name: Burned men bring plants
g19.description: After a conflict in primeval community, a group of men or youths (Paresi: a boy and a girl) burned themselves in a bonfire (or leap over it, etc.). As a result, people acquire cultivated plants, especially corn

l85b1.name: After coming to the sky, gets normal body
l85b1.description: A man with incomplete or  grotesque body becomes normal after coming to the sky (getting back to the earth)

a13a1.name: Raven obtains the Sun
a13a1.description: Raven obtains the hidden or stolen Sun

a35.name: Spots on the lunar disc
a35.description: Dark spots on the lunar disc are dirt, blood, paint, traces of beating, burning, scratching, etc. on the Moon person's body or face (Kiliwa: spots on the Sun) and do not form any particular figure

l77.name: Girl seen as a fruit eaten up
l77.description: Person sees or smells people as delicious objects and devours them

g29.name: Demon made of artifacts
g29.description: Demonic person turns into or consists of different household objects or tools (and into elements of a landscape)

f41.name: The men kill the women
f41.description: The men of primeval community kill the women because of their unsocial behavior

b47.name: The Pleiades bring cold
b47.description: In former times or regularly the Pleiades or other group of stars produced or produce till now severe cold. (The heliacal set of the Pleiades is in May-June while in the Northern Hemisphere they are seen best of all in the winter time)

k74.name: Hero, his companions and a dwarf
k74.description: The hero and his companion or companions live together. Every morning one stays at home while another or others go to hunt, etc. A demonic person comes, eats up all the food and beats the cook. Or the man who remained at home comes to the demon himself in search of fire and is maltreated by him. The hero kills or neutralizes the demon

m23.name: Mock plea
m23.description: Рerson or creature pretends to be afraid of a particular sort of treatment that really cannot do him any harm

b51.name: Mosquito and thunder
b51.description: Bloodsucking insect does not tell thunder that it has sucked human blood

l26.name: Death of initiated boys
l26.description: During the first initiation supernatural beings teach boys the rituals and kill them for breaking rules related to consumption and distribution of food. In response men kill the supernaturals and reproduce their appearance and/or voices during the rituals

m18b.name: Getting fishing hook or harpoon
m18b.description: Person turns into a fish to steal fishing hook or harpoon or he turns into fishing hook to catch a fish

k37c.name: To recognize an object or an animal
k37c.description: Person must recognize a particular object or animal among several similar objects or animals

b36.name: Color, voice, form: one divided between many
b36.description: Because the integrity of some creature or (rare) object is ruined, different beings get their present colors, voices and other anatomical traits

i48.name: Confined to the underworld
i48.description: Certain person loses his or her freedom, is confined to a far away place (often, to the underworld) and acquires cosmic dimensions: supports the earth or the sky and/or his or her movements produce earthquakes or (rare) storms

l65d.name: Younger sister of cannibal woman
l65d.description: When the elder sister becomes a cannibal, the younger one (temporarily) escapes. Cf. motifs L1B, L65C

j38.name: Talons got stuck
j38.description: A mighty bird thrust its talons into a big fish, whale, water monster, etc. Talons get stuck, the bird is either pulled down under the water or makes itself free with great difficulty

c17.name: Fire pit for the people
c17.description: The men of primeval community destroy most of the people and/or themselves in a fire pit or on the bonfire

m29i.name: Trickster-hawk
m29i.description: In episodes related to deception, absurd, obscene or anti-social behavior the protagonist is hawk

b28.name: Travelling transformer
b28.description: The transformer walks along coming across different persons, transforming them into birds, animals, stones, shrines, etc. and introducing cultural norms

m83.name: Who is older?
m83.description: Somebody claims that he has been born before present world came into being. His opponent claims the same, and they argue who of them is the older

j39.name: Who killed a rabbit?
j39.description: Antagonist makes a girl or a woman his or her slave. The slave's brothers or sons secretly come to her, kill for her some small game. Woman tries to pursue the antagonist that she herself killed the game

k27a.name: Ordeal: survive frosty night
k27a.description: An ordeal: to survive frosty night outdoors or in chamber with ice

m43.name: Doll as a decoy
m43.description: To kill or catch a monster, human figure of wood or clay or alive woman is exposed as a bait. Usually monster's claws or sharp leg get stuck in the wood

f15.name: Trickster’s penis masked as a plant
f15.description: Rape of a girl is misled into sitting down on a plant which in reality is a penis

k78.name: Extracted from finger
k78.description: An ogre (an ogress) swallows people, is killed but the people are not found in his or her belly or are found dead. Only when the ogre's finger is cut off, the hero finds a remedy to revive the people or the swallowed up (the swallowed hero himself) come out alive from the finger of the ogre

b44e.name: Dispute of animals
b44e.description: Participants of the discussion concerning number of the units of time, etc. are animals (rare: animals and elements, in particular Wind)

h36h.name: The unhappy jump
h36h.description: Some beings, frog and toad among them, have to overcome an obstacle. This is realized not the way it was planned and as a consequence, people become mortal

h43a.name: Broken figure of the first man
h43a.description: After making human body, creator goes away for a time. In his absence another person makes attempt to break human figure that was not yet alive

h45.name: The abused bread
h45.description: A woman or child demonstrate no respect for bread soiling it with excrements. For this God punishes all the humanity

l39a.name: Demon from underworld
l39a.description: A demon comes from the underworld and attacks a man who has climbed a tree

a25.name: Getting accustomed to the light
a25.description: When people see light of day for the first time, they are prohibited to look at it immediately. Those who break this taboo are ruined

f25.name: Origin of menses: girl smeared with blood
f25.description: Woman is smeared with blood or red paint. Since then women menstruate

m48.name: Trickster turns into buffalo
m48.description: Trickster asks an animal to transform him but breaks condition of transformation and acquires his original guise. Usually he asks a big horned animal (buffalo, elk) to turn him into buffalo (elk) too. Animal charges, trickster is scared. Next time he remains on the place, turns into buffalo but trying to transform the same way another person, turns back into his own self

a27.name: Crowns of the Sun and Moon
a27.description: Light and/or heat of the Sun and/or Moon originate from their crowns, necklaces or clothes (of feathers, of animal teeth)

k64b.name: Object sticks to a body
k64b.description: Hero's adversary provokes him to touch an object that proves to be sticky. The hero sticks to it, sometimes has to cut off his finger

b85a.name: Wind regulated
b85a.description: Wind blows in a wrong way, people can get no game or fish. When a hero overcomes it, it initially becomes too calm but the hero creates the desirable balance

b64b.name: Small bones: war between different fish
b64b.description: Fish of two species shoot arrows into each other. Since then there are many small bones in the fish or some bones are forked

b67.name: Tree turns to rocks
b67.description: People fell giant tree. The fallen tree and/or its stump turns into mountain(s) or rocks

m18.name: Stolen arrows and hooks
m18.description: Person transforms himself into an object of hunting or fishing and provokes hunters of fishermen to catch or shoot him. Arrows, darts, a harpoon stick in his body, he carries them away or he bites off and carries away a fishing hook. Or he fishes by way of turning himself into a hook. Another or (rare) the same person tries to repeat the trick but suffers a reverse (usually is fished out)

f65c.name: The feigned burial: boy exposes deceit
f65c.description: A man feigns death to marry his daughter or to eat burial food. One of the younger children recognizes the (adoptive) father or gets to see that the false dead is alive (escapes from the burial pyre, laughs, etc.)

m56c.name: To measure a snake
m56c.description: Person promises to bring a snake. The snake agrees to let him measure it. He ties the snake to a measuring stick or during the measuring finds a vulnerable place on the snake’s body

l47.name: Enemy moves backward and dies
l47.description: Hero's enemy ascends a tree or rock head downward or walks backward letting the hero better possibility to kill him or to escape

m74aa.name: Theft of food by playing godfather
m74aa.description: An animal person pretends that he has been invited to be godfather at a baptism (or invited to a funeral or wedding) but instead eats secretly food supplies

l20a.name: Eater of parrots
l20a.description: A man climbs a tree, throws down bird nestlings to a woman. She eats them raw and then kills or tries to kill the man

b33a1.name: The offended March
b33a1.description: Person teases, offends March or other month and is punished

f65.name: The false burial
f65.description: To realize his or her secret desire (illicit sex, refusal to share food with relations), person pretends to die and is abandoned at a burial place

c33b.name: The primordial calm
c33b.description: The primordial race perishes when the wind blows for the first time

m144.name: The wasp nest as king’s drum
m144.description: One animal person gets to convince another that dangerous or disgusting objects are attractive and delicious (a wasp nest is a drum, a snake is a girdle, a heap of dung is a delicacy, etc.)

b95.name: Burned bottom parts
b95.description: Human posterior looks in particular way because certain person burned it

l100d.name: The entrapped suitors
l100d.description: A pretty, faithful wife is courted by one or several men, one of them usually a clergyman. With her husband’s consent, she invites the suitor(s) to a private rendezvous. Before the first man’s wishes are gratified, the next one arrives and then the husband himself. The suitor or suitors are caught in an uncomfortable position and then killed, punished in some other manner, ridiculed, made to pay ransom, to work, etc.

h36i.name: Death and the goat
h36i.description: Goat or sheep is responsible for introduction of permanent death

l72b.name: Whetstone becomes a mountain
l72b.description: Running away from a dangerous being, person throws objects that turn into mighty obstacles on the way of the pursuer. One of the thrown objects is a whetstone which turns into a mountain

i87c.name: The hut in a mitten
i87c.description: Animals use for a shelter an object like a mitten, skull, etc. that belongs to the world of the people

m22a.name: Stock guardian
m22a.description: A long-necked bird living near water (stork, heron, swan) is a guard in a strange house or land where hero comes

k118.name: The prohibited room
k118.description: Master of the house allows person to enter all rooms besides one. The person breaks prohibition and the master gets to know about it

b3c.name: An attempt to drown God
b3c.description: When dry land is created, Creator takes a rest and sleeps. His antagonist decides to drown him and drags him to the edge of the earth. The dry land grows in size as long as the antagonist drags the Creator's body, the edge never reached

c35.name: Cosmic marriage cancelled
c35.description: It becomes known that if the Sun or the Sky marry, great calamity is inevitable. The marriage plans are given up

k89.name: A girl and a witch: presents of kinsfolk
k89.description: A girl and a witch marry two brothers. Both daughters-in-law have to bring presents from their kinsfolk. The girl finds her brother, brothers or sister whose disappearance was described in the beginning of the tale and receives treasure. Presents brought by the witch worth nothing

m93a.name: Guard punished
m93a.description: Person punishes the part of his body which he selected as his guard for the time of his sleep or absence (he burns his buttocks, breaks eyes)

m53b.name: Bag with songs
m53b.description: Trickster pretends to have songs in his bag

m90a.name: To marry a man who would give a correct answer
m90a.description: A girl is promised to a man who would know her name or whose finger would fit her ring, or who would guess a material from which certain object is made or grown. Person finds a correct answer by deception

j22e.name: Placenta person
j22e.description: A second person evolves from the placenta of the first one

f39.name: The epoch of women
f39.description: The women dominated over the men in the past or in a far away land, were the active part in marriage relations, practiced activities which now are reserved of the men only

m158.name: Tops or buts
m158.description: Two animals (an animal and a person, an ogre and a person, etc.) agree to divide a crop in such a way that one would take what is above the ground and another what is beneath ground. One of them (several times makes a wrong choice (takes turnip tops and wheat roots)

b28a.name: Pierced to the ground
b28a.description: Person who have been transforming people into animals or stones is pierced to the ground with a pole

d4f.name: Beaver or fish let themselves to be roasted
d4f.description: Beaver (in North American) or a small fish (in South America) lets fire owners catch and roast it, then revives and carries the fire away

k110.name: Reflection of golden sword
k110.description: Person must get a treasure from the bottom of water body. He understands that what he sees is a reflection in water while the treasure is high in a tree

i87aa.name: The long bull
i87aa.description: A bull or a horse of a huge length is described (the head in one field, the tail in another; person who is near the head walks a long time till he meets a one neat the tail)

i31.name: Master and mistress of the dead
i31.description: In the Beyond, every soul is treated by the mythological characters of the opposite sex

k35c1.name: The best is one whom you love
k35c1.description: A mighty person asks a man which of two women is prettier, what is the most beautiful thing, and the like. Giving a correct answer, the man is not killed like those who were before him but receives a reward

m29v.name: Trickster is a small ungulate
m29v.description: In episodes related to deception, absurd, obscene or anti-social behavior the protagonist is a small ungulate (deer, gazelle, antelope)

f69.name: Obscene invitation
f69.description: A woman's husband or male relative asks her (grand)children to invite her to make love with him. The invitation is expressed in an allegoric form. She understands, comes to him

e21.name: Avenged victim of water creatures
e21.description: Child fishes with poison or his or her body produces fish poison. Fish or water snake kills him or her. The perished child is avenged

k27x4.name: To climb a tree with a full glass in hand
k27x4.description: Person must climb a tree (pole, rock) with a full open vessel in hand and not a drop should be spilled

h18b.name: Cattle returns into water
h18b.description: Because of a broken taboo (to look, to speak in a loud voice, etc.) domestic animals are lost (disappear in water, remain in the sky, scatter in various directions, etc.)

f54b.name: Traces of feathers
f54b.description: A youth or boy decorated with feathers and paint copulates incognito with his mother or sister. They discover his identity noticing on his body traces of feathers or paint

k113a.name: To take wife where arrow falls
k113a.description: A young man shoots an arrow or throws an object on the off-chance to take bride where the object falls

i19.name: People inhale the odor of food
i19.description: Anthropomorphic beings satisfy their hunger cooking food and inhaling the odor

f64b.name: Incestuous woman
f64b.description: A woman pretends to be a stranger to have sexual relations with her (grand)son, daughter or brother

k22b.name: Man helps inhabitants of other world
k22b.description: Inhabitants of a distant land who have different nature than (normal) human beings struggle from time to time with some non-human enemies. Man helps local dwellers because their enemies are not dangerous for the human beings

j12a.name: Penis in a pot
j12a.description: A girl or two sisters get to old woman who suggests them to marry her son. It is a worm or alive penis preserved by its mother in a pot. The girl (the sister) rejects it, runs away

k27z.name: Game of chance
k27z.description: Confrontation between the hero and his antagonist has a from of a game of chance

f40a.name: Husband of the first women
f40a.description: An anthropomorphic male or an androgyne is the only possessor or leader of women

m108a.name: Trickster as an adopted child
m108a.description: An old couple live alone and adopt a boy (a trickster-animal) as a son. He steals their property and runs away

a29b.name: The Moon torn in half
a29b.description: Person, connected with the upper world and another person connected with the lower world or the earth both are eager to possess a hero or heroin who is associated with the Moon

m29x.name: Trickster is a hyena
m29x.description: In episodes related to deception, absurd, obscene or anti-social behavior the protagonist is a hyena

k23a.name: Feathers are the birds’ weapon
k23a.description: Birds use their feathers as arrows or their arrows and down stick mouth openings of them enemies

b77c.name: Serpent pushes sky up
b77c.description: Serpent-like creature pushes the sky far away from the earth

f78.name: Toothed anus
f78.description: Person or creature has toothed anus or second head in place of the anus

l14.name: Reared up serpent
l14.description: A worm, reptile or a small water creature is brought home and reared up. When big, it goes out of human control or becomes something huge and/or dangerous

g21.name: Coconut palm from a human head
g21.description: Coconut palm grows out of the human head

i69.name: Star dung
i69.description: Shining sky objects or atmospheric phenomena are excrements of sky dwellers

f65a.name: Death feigned to meet paramour
f65a.description: Person pretends to die. His or her wife or husband abandons him or her on a burial place. He or she marries his or her paramour

m167a.name: The tiger who is afraid of Twilight
m167a.description: A strong predator (usually a tiger) overhears a person saying that he fears something worse than a tiger The word is unknown to the tiger (twilight, etc). Thinking it must be a terrible thing he hides and then runs away

j61.name: Light as a feather
j61.description: Person is able to move or to hover in the air like a feather or a bit of fluff

m142.name: Fox blames his tail
m142.description: Fox blames his tail for being useless when escaping from the pursuers (usually he punishes his tail and gets killed himself as a result)

b101.name: Slashes on birch bark
b101.description: Angry against the birch, person beats or cuts it, whence scratches and slashes on its bark

m26.name: Ducks rise hunter into the air
m26.description: Person attempts to hunt ducks or geese catching them by the legs. They rise him into the air, he falls down

e9e.name: Puppy as a reward
e9e.description: Youth gets to supernatural beings, rejects any treasure, asks for a puppy, a dog's skin, a fruit, etc. When he returns home, the puppy (skin, etc.) turn into magic wife

m190.name: The beaver and the porcupine
m190.description: The beaver ferries the porcupine and usually throws him into water or abandons on an island

i14a.name: Eject digested food through the mouth
i14a.description: No-anus people eject digested food through the mouth or other orifice

k67a.name: Drowned wife
k67a.description: A socially weak man is a nuisance for stronger persons. He gets to know that they plan to drown him and tricks them to drown instead one of them or their own property

m91d.name: Drowned shaman
m91d.description: Person deceives the other (giving out a corpse for alive person, accusing incent people of murder, etc.). When a shaman (almost) gets to know the truth, the trickster kills her or him and gets to avoid any punishment

c2a.name: Conflagration of the woodpecker
c2a.description: Two persons meet a woodpecker and as a consequence, the earth burns. The strong and smart person survives, the weak and stupid is burned

i39.name: Rainbow road or bridge
i39.description: Rainbow is a road or bridge by which some ascend to the sky or descend from it

k89a.name: In search of the place to abandon the sister
k89a.description: A girl with her maimed sister or brother escapes from a danger. The sister (brother) rejects some places where the girl wants to abandon her or him but agrees with her last suggestion

k119.name: Puss in boots
k119.description: An animal intends to help a poor man to become rich, gets for him a bride, makes other people believe that the groom is rich. The man becomes prosperous indeed

k33h.name: The cat, the dog and the magic object
k33h.description: A man obtains an object that fulfills desires. The object is stolen but brought back by the animals which had been formerly saved by the man

g8b.name: Cutting tree to get a person
g8b.description: Person hides in a tree. Somebody tries to fell it but the notch disappears and the tree becomes intact

m50.name: Man follows stars
m50.description: A man tries to join a group of persons who are or become stars (usually the Pleiades) but suffers a reverse; or he pursues the stars to have sexual contact or to be reintegrated with members of his family

b40.name: Rabbit as deer’s proxy
b40.description: Hare or rabbit is a false deer or it was deer in the past or a close kin of the deer or had horns or antlers or missed opportunity to get them, its ears are the false horns

k92b.name: Love you like salt
k92b.description: A girl answers her father (rare: brother) that she loves him like she loves salt (or that salt is the most valuable, etc.). He becomes angry (usually drives her away) but later satisfies himself that she was right

h37.name: Magic device lost by a failure
h37.description: Magic object, device that makes hunting or fishing easy gets into possession of a person who is unable to operate it or abuses it. The device kills or injures the failure himself, other people and/or disappears

m102.name: Person lets his leg or head to be cut off
m102.description: A bird stands with one leg tucked under it, putting its head under its wing; turtle draws its head and limbs under its shell. Person decides that the bird has one leg, no head, turtle has neither head nor limbs, asks to cut him his head and limbs off

h11.name: The call of God
h11.description: People become mortal because they do not hear or answer a call of a being who promises them immortality (or do not pronounce his name) or answer a call (pronouns the name) of a being who brings death

g8a.name: Cutting tree to make a canoe
g8a.description: To make some object (usually a canoe), person cuts a tree, goes away, returns, finds the tree intact. Usually another person who was restoring the tree by magic fells it down himself and makes a canoe for the hero

a32k.name: First to the Sun, then to the Moob
a32k.description: Person seen in the Moon initially had to get to the Sun or the Sun and the Moon argue who of them should get the person

m174.name: Eats from behind
m174.description: A week animal person immobilizing a strong one becomes to eat him from behind and refuses to come to the head where the stronger one can still bite him; or is waiting till the strong animal dies

b84.name: Fungi and excrescences (ogress transformed)
b84.description: A female demonic person, usually while she is pursuing a man, dies and her flesh turns into objects that are found on trees, like fungi, pitch, fruits or nuts

k15b.name: Substituted barrel of water
k15b.description: Because containers with alive and dead water (one makes one stronger, another weaker) are imperceptibly exchanged, during the battle the hero drinks the alive water and overcomes his enemy who drinks the dead water

f37.name: Gourd vessel put on the surface of water
f37.description: Person knocks the gourd vessel that floats above the water to call water monster or serpent. Usually a woman calls this way her monstrous paramour

l56.name: Fire in monster’s belly
l56.description: A monster or a big animal dies when fire is kindled in its belly

d11.name: Food baked in armpits
d11.description: Before fire became known, people prepared food using warmth of their bodies (usually putting food in their armpits); or a person keeps fire in his or her armpits

f42a.name: Men turn into birds
f42a.description: Young men and boys turn into birds or bats, fly away

m162.name: Eats his own innards
m162.description: Person pretends to eat his own innards or flesh and persuades the other to do the same. Other believes and kills themselves

h32a.name: Superfertility lost: a maltreated wife
h32a.description: Supernatural woman comes to live with humans. Thanks to that, food becomes easily available. She is maltreated, goes away, temporal superfertility is lost forever

h1a.name: The originator of death the first sufferer
h1a.description: One person wants man to live forever, another wants man to be mortal. When somebody dear to the latter one dies, he or she is eager to accept the suggestion of his or her opponent but the original decision cannot be changed

i85a.name: Horses around Polaris
i85a.description: Hoofed animals are walking around Polaris

k25d.name: Prohibited bulb in the sky
k25d.description: Person gets to the sky, makes hole through the firmament digging out a root. Usually woman's husband or his kinsmen warn her against digging out a special bulb or tuber; breaking taboo, she gets to see the earth, decides to descend

l94.name: Child promised to demon
l94.description: A demon helps a man or a woman or lets him or her free. As a reward, the person is forced to promise to give the demon his child

l32.name: Gluttonous stone
l32.description: Stone swallows, bites or transforms people

m183.name: A race: one against many
m183.description: Many animals of one species that all look identical together fulfill the task that would be impossible for any of them if he were alone; the competitors believe that the task was fulfilled by only one animal. Usually a slow and a fast animals agree to race. The slow one puts others who look like him at the finish or along the distance, each one answering the fast one that he is ahead of him. The fast one accepts his loss

k137.name: Sister tricks women to come and revive her brother
k137.description: When her brother is killed, a girl puts on his clothes and in a guise of a man wins competitions and gets women who are able to revive the dead. She puts the clothes back on her brother and the women come and revive him taking him for their husband. Or a sister is killed and her brother after winning wives tricks them to revive her

j29.name: Father’s shadow
j29.description: A murdered parent of the hero comes to him as a ghost and informs about the circumstances of his or her death

i102.name: Milky Way is a tree
i102.description: Milky Way is a tree or a trace of a tree

b61.name: The mole’s paw
b61.description: Mole had to support the sky or the Sun that had fallen down. Usually its paw (hand) remained crooked after this

h36gg.name: Death and the coyote
h36gg.description: Coyote is responsible for introduction of permanent death

l35.name: Demon’s hand broken
l35.description: At night, a shaman or a bush spirit comes and inserts his hand into the hut to steal food or to make this way love with a sleeping woman. A man who is in the hut cuts the hand off or breaks it

f73.name: The illusory wound
f73.description: Person mistakes a vulva or an anus for a wound; vulva is a unhealed wound on the body of the primeval women

b57a.name: Red sunset contains a message
b57a.description: When person gets to see that the sky becomes red he or she understands that another person's blood is shed or that another person spilled a red liquid

a22a.name: The hot Sun and its cold companion
a22a.description: After two persons burn up, one turns into the present Sun and another into a less important sky object

i18.name: A spouse or husband without anus or mouth
i18.description: Person visits people who have no anus or mouth. He or his sister marries or tries to marry a local dweller

g10.name: The hanging tree
g10.description: A tree which trunk is cut through do not fall because it is hold from above

l33g.name: Rock with a beard
l33g.description: A rock or tree kills everyone who names it in a certain way. Person provokes others to do it and devours the killed ones. The last of the invited ones deceives the provoker

k61e.name: Woman rewarded for making a person laugh
k61e.description: When a powerful (supernatural) person gets to see a woman in a ridiculous situation, he or she becomes to laugh (and thus cured from his disease). The woman is rewarded, saved from a danger

m46d.name: Child cries for a toy
m46d.description: A small child cries and becomes satisfied only when he gets a particular object to play with. This object is of high value and is hidden in the house. As soon as the object is given to the child, the fate of his mother or of whole humanity changes

j12.name: Travelling girl comes across suitors
j12.description: A girl (or two sisters) travel, usually in search of a proper marriage partner who lives far away or who has gone away. On her way or after reaching the place of destination the girl gets to some unpleasant suitors

j53.name: The fawns and the cubs
j53.description: Deer person is killed by the stronger animal person. The deer's children revenge on the murderer and (or) successively escape from him or her

m185.name: On the tail of the fast one

j41.name: Foxes jeer at the abandoned person
j41.description: When the hero returns home after a long absence, his relation does not believe at first that it is really he because all this time somebody jeered at him or her imitating the hero's voice, telling that the hero is back, etc.

b38e.name: Swan marries crow
b38e.description: A bird with white or bright feathers marries a bird with black feathers but flies away after getting know that his or her marriage partner eats carrion or excrements

m9.name: Stuck in a tree hollow
m9.description: Person who puts her or his head or hand into a tree hollow or (rare) other hole is stuck fast or falls into the hollow and dies or undergoes a metamorphosis

e38a.name: Woman gives birth to many embryos
e38a.description: Woman gives birth to a gourd, a bag (with eggs), a piece of meat. The flesh is cut into pieces which turn into people or many people come out of the gourd or bag

d13f.name: Laughter and fire
d13f.description: Laughter triggers emergence or spread of fire. Usually fire is obtained from a creature when it bursts out laughing

m53a.name: Raven and seals
m53a.description: Raven tricks seals or other water mammals to gather around him and kills them by deception

k33e.name: Disappeared and returned children
k33e.description: Babies disappear but are ultimately returned to their mother or father grown up and in good health

m87.name: Invisible ghosts
m87.description: Person enters a seemingly empty house and attempts to take certain things. Invisible beings prevent him from doing it or objects themselves hurt him

m75c.name: Treasure on mountain top
m75c.description: A man sends another one to top of a mountain or a tree to obtain treasure for him. To go back is impossible but the man survives

a32b.name: The Moon toad
a32b.description: Frog or toad are seen in the moon or the Moon is associated with them

l15e.name: Hero’s life in his sword
l15e.description: Hero's life is in certain object, usually in his weapon. When antagonist steals the object or throws it away, the hero dies but revives after his friends or brothers find the object and bring it back

m29w.name: Trickster is a feline
m29w.description: In episodes related to deception, absurd, obscene or anti-social behavior the protagonist is a feline (jaguar, ocelote, puma)

h18.name: Hoarded game released
h18.description: Game animals were concentrated in one single place. Certain person lets them disperse in the world

m90.name: To guess of what material an object is made
m90.description: Somebody suggests to guess what sort of material a certain object is made of. Another person (usually a monster) gets to know the secret and the hero or the heroin must do what they have promised

k73c.name: Bird carries baby-girl to its nest
k73c.description: A bird carries away a baby-girl, brings her up in its nest, the baby becomes a beautiful girl

k27k.name: Diving contest
k27k.description: A contest: to dive deep or for a long time

m179a.name: The owner driven out of his house
m179a.description: Using a trick the intruder occupies other person’s house and refuses to let the owner in

k127a.name: Temporarily mute heroine
k127a.description: A girl or young woman is bewitched to be mute or must keep silence for a period of time. Just when she has to be put to death, the period of her muteness is over and she is saved

l65.name: Demonic baby
l65.description: A baby or small child proves to be a demon, devours or injures people

b69a.name: Council on seasons, chipmunk participates
b69a.description: Chipmunk or an animal of similar size (weasel, pika) is engaged into argument with another animal person (bear, elk, puma, snake) if it should be warm and light or cold and dark

f45.name: The amazons
f45.description: There are (or were) women who live apart from men in their own village or villages

k132a.name: Husband’s cock and wife’s hen
k132a.description: Husband (rare: wife) sends his cock to earn money and the cock brings it. Wife (husband) sends her hen (cat, her half of a cock, etc.) and it brings filth

k56d.name: Broken leg of a nestling
k56d.description: A man cures injured bird, it brings him a seed from which something valuable grows. Another man intentionally injures and then cures a bird, kit brings him a seed from which something harmful grows

b5b.name: The universal mother
b5b.description: Woman (alone or with her companion) gives birth to or creates not only people but also different creatures and objects

i35a.name: Old woman’s thunder
i35a.description: Thunder is produced by an old woman who lives in the sky

g12b.name: Star-person gives plants
g12b.description: Star-person is a giver of cultivated plants

k65c1.name: Separating the rich from the poor
k65c1.description: A woman gives birth to many children but conceals part of them from God. The concealed children become ancestors of the people of the lower social status while those that had been shown to God become ancestors of the high status people

d13h.name: The dead should not laugh
d13h.description: Person should not laugh in the world of the dead

k27v1.name: Dancing apples
k27v1.description: A task: to bring objects (usually fruits) that act like people, i.e. dance, sing and the like

j23a.name: A mucus-boy
j23a.description: A woman is crying, mucus from her nose turns into a boy who grows up, overcome powerful adversaries

c34a.name: Buried in sand
c34a.description: A supernatural person comes to people who fish. They bury him on the beach or throw him into river or marsh. Somebody saves him. He or his father sends the flood

m98.name: Who are more numerous?
m98.description: Person reckons up number of members in two alternative multitudes (alive trees and dead trees, men and women, etc.). Numbers prove to be equal but one member possesses the qualities of the both multitudes. Adding it to one of them, person demonstrates his case

b54.name: Chips turn into fish
b54.description: Chips of wood, branches or pieces of bark thrown or fallen into the water turn into fish and/or aquatic animals

k128.name: Grazing animals to be preserved by a herdsman
k128.description: A man had to graze animals or birds. If at least one is lost, the master would kill (not reward) him

m197a.name: The pot has a child and dies
m197a.description: A borrower returns a cattle (pot) together with a small one, claiming that the cattle gave birth to a child. He borrows the pot again but does not return it, claiming that the pot dies

k3.name: Tree or rock grows taller
k3.description: Hero climbs up a tree or rock to get eggs, nestlings, fruits, honey, etc. Another person makes the tree (rock) grow higher or thicker and the hero is unable to descend back

g7.name: Blunt axes
g7.description: Ancestors need to fell a gigantic tree or a vertical rock. Their axes become blunt or break and/or they are in search of a proper axe to cope with their work. Usually they are cutting the tree with different cultivated plants on its branches

b5a.name: Two creators: a dialogue
b5a.description: In the beginning of time, a male and a female persons meet each other and become engaged into the dialogue

c18.name: Dance for the hidden Sun
c18.description: Certain person hides valuables or the impersonator of the valuables hides himself or herself from the people. To get valuables, the interest of their owner or imperso­nator is attracted or diverted by way of singing, dancing, playing music, provocative behavior, offering of unusual gifts, sex or alcohol

i84a.name: Son of God frozen to death
i84a.description: In winter time despite warning son of the sky deity sets off (usually on his snow-shoes) and is frozen to death

c14.name: Monsters destroy people
c14.description: During or before the world catastrophe (deluge, darkness) wild beasts and monsters attack and destroy people

k133.name: Foam-flecked horse
k133.description: Every morning a horse is exhausted because animals or demonic creatures ride it at night

i56.name: Ghosts do not see people from earth
i56.description: Person who gets into another world is invisible for its inhabitants and his touch makes local person ill

f91.name: A worm-breeder
f91.description: A man lets his wife to be eaten up by worms. She either dies or has a narrow escape

m141.name: Animals in a pit
m141.description: Travelling animals fall in a pit and eat one another up until only one (usually the fox) is left and escapes from the pit

d4aa.name: Moth is sent to steal fire
d4aa.description: Moths try to get fire from people and to bring it to somebody else

b92.name: Flint turns into flints
b92.description: Person who embodies flint or other hard stone is broken, stones disperse in the world

l81a.name: Cat brings a misfortune
l81a.description: Because a girl or young woman offends a cat (rare: a dog), it plays a trick that brings the girl a misfortune (usually extinguishes the fire and in search of it the girl gets to a demon)

l114a.name: A child who stays awake
l114a.description: A member (usually the youngest) of a group of boys or girls gets with them to a cannibal. The cannibal plans to kill people when they fall asleep. The youngest boy or girl every time answers the cannibal why he or she is still awake and forces him or her to be engaged into different activities instead of killing the sleeping people. Brothers (sisters) run away and return home

k44.name: False parent
k44.description: Spirit or animal person steals a boy, tells him that she or he is his real mother or father. The boy gets to know the truth, leaves the false parent

k56f.name: To divide a chicken
k56f.description: A man divides a cooked chicken (goose) according to social ranks of the people (e.g. head of the household gets chicken’s head, his daughters get wings, etc.), takes himself not prestige but meaty parts and is rewarded. Another man brings several chickens but is unable to divide them in a proper way. The first man is called again, divides chickens with ingenuity and is rewarded again

m60a.name: Unrecognized hero comes to one whom he wounded
m60a.description: Hero wounds an animal or a supernatural creature, then masks as a doctor, comes unrecognized to the one whom he wounded, either cures or kills him

l5e.name: Wife’s headless body pursues her husband
l5e.description: The beheaded woman pursues her husband while her head pursues her children

j55.name: Unrecognized hero comes across enemies
j55.description: Hero comes across different creatures or persons who do not recognize him. Everyone tells that he is waiting for the Hero to kill him. The hero easily kills or transforms them himself

b42c.name: Sky hunters pursue a bear
b42c.description: In the cosmic hunt tale the game pursued by the hunters is a bear

k27z5.name: An agreement to marry the would be born children
k27z5.description: Two men agree to marry their future children if a girl and a boy will be born. The boy is poor or he loses his former status after his father’s death, the girl’s parents decide to evade the given obligation. The boy grows up and finds his bride

l11.name: Turtle-bench
l11.description: In a non-human world objects of everyday life have appearance of animals and monsters, mainly fish, amphibians and reptiles

k73a1.name: Baby substituted with a broom
k73a1.description: Rivals of the beloved wife hide or throw away her baby and substitute it with a broom, stone or other inanimate object

b40b.name: Horse exchanges features with cow
b40b.description: The horse exchanges some parts of his body with the cow, usually gives her horns and/or obtains teeth

i88.name: Animal with many tails
i88.description: There is a zoomorphic being with many tails

k52a.name: Slave pours water on fireplace
k52a.description: A man descends to the bottom of the sea to rescue his wife. He makes arrangements with a slave who pours water on fireplace producing steam. Hidden behind the steam, the man escapes with his wife

i86a.name: Down turns into snow
i86a.description: Snow is created from bird's down when certain bird in the sky shakes itself or certain person shakes his or her clothes made of bird down

i115a.name: Orion and the Pleiades as a man and a woman
i115a.description: Orion and the Pleiades are opposed as a man or men and a woman or women. Orion is usually male

i28a.name: Animals produce earthquakes
i28a.description: Big game animals disappear under the earth and produce earthquakes

m57a.name: Bears discharged from body
m57a.description: Instead of common body discharges man or woman urinates, spits, etc. beads, flowers, gold and other valuables

h40.name: Dog is the guard of man
h40.description: Dog guards (successfully or unsuccessfully) the (still unfinished) physical body of man

m32.name: Anus opened
m32.description: Food or liquid that person swallows are immediately pouring out from his bottom part

l108a.name: Goat kills the antagonist
l108a.description: A predator or ogre swallows people or animals. Goat opens the ogre’s belly open, usually the swallowed ones come out alive

i73.name: Stars are sparks
i73.description: Stars (rare: suns and moons) are sparks or burning coals

l95.name: Coming back to pick up toys
l95.description: Person (usually a kid or lad) returns to the former place to pick up the forgotten object (often a toy) and is caught there by a demonic being

b42a.name: Blood or fat drops to earth
b42a.description: Hunters pursue a bear across the sky, kill it in August – October. Its blood or fat drops to earth as a dew or painting leaves of the trees in red

d5.name: A woman and the
d5.description: Female person is the owner or inventor (but not personification) of fire

m57c.name: Ass defecates gold
m57c.description: A domestic animal (ass, cow, horse) defecates gold or food

b44d.name: Black-an-white animal is night and day
b44d.description: There are both night and day because spotted (or otherwise black and white) animal has been killed

k56a3.name: Not to fix laces on clothes and shoes
k56a3.description: Though laces on her clothes or shoes get loose, a girl on her way to the powerful persons or back should not tie them up

b33a.name: One dies of cold in the spring
b33a.description: Believing that a winter is over, an old woman (rare: a young girl, a man) goes outdoors (usually to graze her animals) without a proper clothing. It becomes cold again and she dies of cold

k27z2.name: Wife gives birth to her husband’s son  while husband is absent
k27z2.description: A man who is far away from his wife visits her using magic or a wife visits her husband incognito. She gives birth to his son but people believe she was untrue to her husband. Ultimately her chastity is recognized

f56.name: Watching vagina triggers incest
f56.description: A man or boy thinks about incest when he gets to see his daughter(-in-law)'s, sister's, or mother(in-law)'s vagina

k24b.name: To dance in her magic clothes
k24b.description: Magic wife gets her wings back and flies away after she pretends that putting her real clothes she would be more beautiful, a better dancer, etc.

c3.name: Hole in arch
c3.description: During the flood a hole is opened in the arch. An animal stops it up with its own body

m181a.name: Fire at the sunset
m181a.description: Person persuades another to mistake unachievable natural phenomena for the objects of culture. Usually he sends the other to bring a fire indicating a false source of it (a sunset, a firefly) and hides or eats the meat to be cooked during companion’s absence

k1j.name: A marooned man returns home before his adversary
k1j.description: A man marooned on an islet or rock in the sea turns into a bird and flies home. When the man who marooned him comes home, the hero is already there

b33.name: Mother of wind
b33.description: Female person is incarnation of wind, mother of winds, etc.

j20.name: Wicked guest: woman breaks taboo
j20.description: When husband o brother leaves home to hunt, an evil spirit comes to his wife or sister and kills or injures her being able to do it because she has broken taboo to open the door, to look at the guest or to answer him or her

b80.name: Measuring of the world
b80.description: The process of world creation includes the measuring of its size

g8.name: Restored tree
g8.description: A deep notch in the tree (or in the sky support) is magically restored as soon as persons or creatures who cut or gnaw it stop working

k55.name: Chastity rewarded
k55.description: A powerful supernatural wants to check if his guest made love with his wife or daughter. The person is impotent or (successfully pretends to be) chaste and is rewarded or at least gets no harm. Usually the same episodes repeats with another person who is dissolute or unable to control himself. This person is punished

k99a.name: Father will be attending to his son
k99a.description: A man is told that he will be attending to his son or daughter. He drives his son (daughter) away but the prophecy is fulfilled

m116.name: Wisdom of hidden old man saves kingdom
m116.description: People are ordered to kill or (rare) mothers or (the Nyoro) to deprive them of power and property). A man conceals his father. Later the old man helps to resolve difficult problem. It is decide not to kill old men anymore

i93.name: Milky Way is the backbone
i93.description: Milky Way is the backbone of the sky or of all the world

i82b.name: Venus is female
i82b.description: Morning and/or Evening Star is a female personage

k117.name: Woman who never laughs (a bride)
k117.description: A man promises a reward to another man who would be able to make laugh or talk his daughter or mother

k136c.name: Killed and revived periodically
k136c.description: Every time when a demonic person goes away he kills or puts asleep a woman reviving her when he comes back

g6.name: Primeval tree
g6.description: One of the trees is the principal, original one (emerged before all the other; ancestor of wild or cultivated plants; ocean or rivers inside it; world axis; higher than all the others; overshadows sky)

l84.name: Unfit axes
l84.description: Bush spirits and the like try to cut down a tree. The attempt fails because their axes are good for nothing being made of turtle shells, clay, etc.

j19a.name: To serve food on the abdomen
j19a.description: A guest demands that a woman would serve him food on her abdomen

b53.name: Creatures or objects from cut off genitals
b53.description: Supernaturally big genitals are cut off and turn into snakes or other creatures and objects

b60.name: Offended children abandon parents
b60.description: Children conflict with their parents who do not pay them enough attention, condemn their sexual behavior, do not give them enough food, clothes, etc.; the children abandon their parents and become birds, bats, atmospheric phenomena, or stars (usually the Pleiades)

c32.name: Beware of cut off nails
c32.description: The cut off nails (and hair) have special significance for the fate of the soul in the beyond or for the future of the entire world

l81.name: Demon’s fire
l81.description: Person sets off in search of fire and finds it in the house of a demon. The demon makes harm to the person

g15.name: Plant maidens
g15.description: In the other world or in the time of the ancestors food products or materials used by people looked as persons

h34e.name: The edible snow
h34e.description: Snow was edible or something edible was falling from the sky instead of the snow

j50a.name: Sons embrace their mother
j50a.description: Mother dies when her sons embrace or push her

f20.name: A strong embrace
f20.description: Man and woman embrace each other forever or for a long time

k53.name: Animal skins as metamorphosis amulets
k53.description: Person temporarily turns into a bird or an animal putting on corresponding skin or animal skins are amulets that become alive and help the person

a32.name: Figure on lunar disc
a32.description: A figure or an imprint of some being or object are seen in the Moon. (For statistical analysis motifs A32A – A32J are also included into A32)

j18.name: Woman falls from the sky
j18.description: A woman who is pregnant or has a small child falls from the sky. She or a daughter born by her dies but her (grand)son is grown up

a29.name: The Sun and a demon compete for the hero
a29.description: Two persons one of whom is connected with the upper and another with the lower or middle world, both are eager to possess another person and pull him or her to his or her side. One or both rivals are female. Person connected with the upper world and/or the object of the competition are luminaries – the Sun, the Moon, or Venus

a24a.name: The first day or night: transformed into spirits
a24a.description: At the moment when the first day or the first night come, (some) people turn into supernatural beings

l9d.name: Sharp hands
l9d.description: Person has sharp nails or knife-like hands to kill people

m39a6a.name: Clever daughter-in-law of the prisoner
m39a6a.description: A powerful man finds a clever wife for his son or for himself. Being imprisoned by enemies he or his daughter-in-law sends a message that only they two understand. The enemies are destroyed, the prisoner is released (rare: his body is found).

c6c1.name: Birds: successful and unsuccessful divers
c6c1.description: Two or more different birds (often a loon and a duck) dive one after another to get earth from under the ocean. Only one of them is successful

j26.name: Babies come out of the water
j26.description: Baby heroes or embryos are found in a river or lake or come to people out of the water

c36.name: The final battle
c36.description: Gods fight with their powerful adversaries at the decisive battle that changes fate of the world

k27x2.name: To steal an egg from under a bird
k27x2.description: Person is able to steal an egg (a nestling, to put it back) from under the bird (to change the bird’s feather; to steal an embryo from animal’s womb, etc.)

m49.name: Man in a skin of another
m49.description: Hero comes across a (animal-)person from an enemy group and takes his or her appearance, usually dressing himself in a skin of his victim; after this he penetrates the enemy camp

l3.name: Husband turns into demon
l3.description: A demon takes appearance of a man and comes to his wife or (rare) to other woman. The woman (alone or with her child) runs away and/or kills the monster (herself or with somebody's help)

l29.name: Fish from a forest pool
l29.description: Person catches fish in a place where it ought not live, i.e. in a forest pond or in a tree hollow isolated from other water bodies. After eating he dies, is transformed and/or attacked by monsters

f42.name: The men abandon the women
f42.description: The men feel themselves offended by the women and abandon them

a12d.name: Eclipses: birds
a12d.description: A bird or birds attack or shade the Sun or the Moon during an eclipse or at the sunrise and sunset

k27g.name: Ordeal: to bathe in boiling water
k27g.description: Person is ordered to bathe in a boiling liquid or to jump into fire but he remains unharmed. Usually the adversary attempts to repeat the trick but dies

l85.name: One-sided people
l85.description: One-sided people have one leg, one half of a head, etc. The second leg is not cut or burned off, preserved as a stump but is absent completely

k61b.name: To get know names
k61b.description: Person is eager to get know names of several strangers. He hides himself and creates situations when the strangers call each other by name

m198b.name: Grasshopper in hand
m198b.description: A king (landlord, etc.) suggests to guess what he has in his hand (in a box). A man gives the correct answer pronouncing by chance the word “grasshopper” (“locust”, “cricket”)

e6.name: Because of a woman worlds become isolated
e6.description: When a woman of the child-bearing age tries to come from one world to another (e.g. from sky to earth), the communication between the worlds is blocked or broken forever

i114.name: Ursa major and the Pleiades as men and women
i114.description: Described in one and the same tale, Ursa major is associated with men and the Pleiades with women

c2.name: Deluge and conflagration combined
c2.description: World is destroyed once with fire or draught, another time with a flood or it is destroyed with a flood of fire or boiling water

m25.name: Banquet in the sky
m25.description: To take part in a feast or to visit God or celestial object, person ascends to the sky. To return, he either uses a rope but falls before reaching ground or jumps (falls) down from the sky and is badly hurt, dead, and/or transformed

b77b1.name: Sky touched with a pestle
b77b1.description: The sky rose to its present height and/or the direct relations of the sky deity with the people were broken off when the sky or the deity was pushed up, touched or struck with a pestle or with a ladle during the preparation of food

k43c.name: Dog unfastens children
k43c.description: Abandoned children are tied to a tree. Helpful dog or other animal unfastens them

l15b.name: To kill with a reed
l15b.description: Person can be killed only with a particular plant that normally is not used as a weapon

m31.name: Trickster thrown into the water
m31.description: Animal person who cannot swim asks a good swimmer to carry him. The latter agrees only to throw his rider into the water

b42e.name: Sky hunters pursue a rhea
b42e.description: In the cosmic hunt tale the game pursued by the hunters is a rhea bird (Rhea americana)

k27z1.name: Not to take a cage, a bridle
k27z1.description: Trying to steal a wonderful bird (horse), hero breaks his helper’s instruction (usually not to take anything else besides the animal or object itself) and is caught but released on condition that he brings another wonderful object. Situation is repeated and the last task is to bring a girl. Ultimately the hero gets both the girl and all the objects

j54b.name: Kills own mother to rescue his half-brother
j54b.description: A hero and a son of the antagonist live together. They are half-brothers friends. When the antagonist makes attempt to kill the hero, the antagonist's son kills his own mother (or his both parents) or helps his human brother to do it

b109.name: Person turns into bear
b109.description: Person turns into bear (origin of bears)

f14.name: Son of a rock
f14.description: Male person copulates with a rock and it gives birth to a hero

a14.name: Eclipses: relations between the Sun and the Moon
a14.description: Coming together of the Sun and the Moon is the reason of their eclipses

m173.name: Pretending dead several times
m173.description: An animal person pretends to be dead and lies down on a road in front of a traveler who carries something valuable. The traveler passes by but returns to pick up the animal when he sees another one, i.e. the same trickster who ran ahead. The trickster steals the possessions that the traveler abandoned for a time

m99.name: House of birds’ bones
m99.description: Person is going to exterminate birds but decides not to do thanks to a wise adviser

c26.name: Guardian at the border of the non-human world
c26.description: Monsters or ghosts try to invade our world. Powerful person or creature is on guard and prevents the invasion

d1a.name: Mother-in-law is the Fire
d1a.description: Girl marries man whose mother is Fire

j12m.name: Woman turns into duck
j12m.description: A girl or two sisters marry a valuable partner. His rival kills or attempts to kill him or his wives. As a consequence, the women turn into water birds

b3a.name: Primeval waters
b3a.description: Water is the original element, the dry earth appears later

d13c.name: Trickster makes his brother’s wife laugh
d13c.description: Two companions or brothers live together. The elder conceals his wife from the younger. In his absence, the younger tries to make the woman laugh and this way to get know her hiding place

m185a.name: On the tail of the winner (all versions)
m185a.description: Birds, animals or fish compete as about who is the fastest or can fly higher than others. A weak one imperceptible sticks to the body of the fastest or strongest and wins

m9a.name: Transformed into tree-frog
m9a.description: Person who sucks honey greedily from a tree hollow and/or is stuck in it turns into tree-frog

k76c.name: Son the gourd.
k76c.description: An (adoptive) son is a gourd. He marries a princess, turns into handsome man.

m118.name: Bull repository / Ali Baba
m118.description: Person brings food from or gets shelter inside of a big animal, a tree or inside some enclosure. Another animal person follows him but gets into trouble

i4c.name: The imprisoned Thunder
i4c.description: Thunder-god is temporarily overcome and imprisoned by his ebemy

f29a.name: Worm killed with boiling water
f29a.description: To kill snake or worm paramour of a woman or girl, person pours on it boiling water, resin or spills live coals

l108f.name: Lured from river-bottom
l108f.description: A person (a girl, a small boy) gets into the water and remains there. Antagonist lures him out imitating his father's or sibling's voice

l75.name: Flint kills his mother
l75.description: One of twin brothers is evil. Being still in the womb, he does not want to be born in a normal way and bursts through his mother’s side killing her

l1e.name: Person creates monstrous birds
l1e.description: A monstrous bird is created from small amount of the flesh of a human being or animal (usually a heart) or from manioc starch

m149.name: Tell them that I am a stump
m149.description: The bear (wolf, lion, etc.) is going to kill a man. Another person or animal pretends not to know about the situation and tells the man that hunters are in search of the bear, have not he seen him? The bear asks the man not to give him out and answer that it is a stump, a log and the like near him. This opens possibility to treat the dangerous animal as a corresponding object (to cut it with an axe, to tie up, etc.)

h16.name: Rivers of tears and blood
h16.description: Rivers or lakes of tears, milk, blood, or water used for washing corpses exist in the world of the dead or separate it from our world

h10.name: Stone sinks, stick floats
h10.description: People are mortal because stone thrown into the water sank. They have missed a chance to be like wood or other organic matter that floated

a32h.name: The Moon plant
a32h.description: A tree or bush is seen in the moon

m39a5.name: Fool kills goats for eating pears
m39a5.description: Fool brings his goats to a fruit tree and kills them when they become to eat fruits that he has thrown down from the tree

m53f.name: Disguised trickster eats up all the food
m53f.description: Taking part in storing up food, person pretends to go away for some reason, returns disguised as a monster or predator, people are scared and run away, the deceiver eats up all the food but is ultimately unmasked

k13b.name: Leg bitten off by caiman
k13b.description: A caiman ferries a man across water body, bites his leg off. The maimed man is transformed into a constellation or into an animal

k33b.name: Friends abandon a pretty girl
k33b.description: A girl goes with her friends to a river, into a forest, etc. Other girls return home but the heroine has to remain or to go back to the forest, etc. She has a narrow escape from a dangerous creature. marries a supernatural being or a chief, or dies but is avenged

m5a.name: Rat in the water
m5a.description: A rat or other animal which cannot swim well rides a canoe with other creatures who can swim or fly and unlike them gets into trouble when the canoe sinks. Usually a water creature carries the rat to the shore but the latter defecates on its savior or kills it

l94a.name: Caught by a beard
l94a.description: Water or chthonic demon suddenly appears before a person (often catches a man who bent down to drink from a well by his beard). The person is forced to fulfill demon's wish

m42a.name: Eyes of berries
m42a.description: Person (usually after losing his own eyes), makes new eyes of berries and is able to see again

e1c.name: Person of excrements
e1c.description: Certain person is made of human excrement or carrion

m58.name: Plant or trail saves from fire
m58.description: World is ablaze, fire pursues a person. Some objects or elements do not resist the heat and cannot hide him. The last named gives protection. Earth becomes cool, person continues his travel

i43a.name: The celestial monster
i43a.description: Giant reptilian monster (serpent, more rare fish, chain of fish) extends in the sky and/or supports the sky being associated with Milky Way or the rainbow

a11c.name: The Sun, the Moon and monster’s eyes
a11c.description: The Sun and the Moon kill a monster whose eyes are unequally bright. The Moon takes the brighter eye but gives it back to the Sun

m53d.name: Would believe enemies
m53d.description: Person creates figures that look like enemies or pretends that enemies come. People run away, person gets all valuables for himself

i128.name: Ursa major is a dipper
i128.description: Ursa major is a dipper, a ladle

d4c.name: Acquisition of summer
d4c.description: Warm season is obtained from its original owners

m198.name: The wise brothers
m198.description: Brothers (rare: one man) have extraordinary powers of observation and describe objects, animals or people whom they never seen or see for the first time. Investigation confirms that their deduction was correct

m45.name: A predator tricks animals to gather around him
m45.description: A predator animal falls asleep or pretends to be dead or sleeping. A lot of animals gather around him, he kills many or they run away in panic

a24.name: The first sunrise
a24.description: In the beginning it is dark. When the Sun first appears on the sky, primeval beings or part of them perish or turn into animals or spirits

l9b.name: Elbow-knives
l9b.description: Person's sharp elbows or (rare) knees are like awls or knives

l95a.name: Floating lungs
l95a.description: A lung or a liver lies on a road or floats in a pond etc. As soon as person touches them, a dangerous demon appears in front of him

m171c.name: In exchange for a thorn
m171c.description: Somebody pulls out a thorn from a person’s body and throws the thorn away. The person claims his thorn back and receives something more valuable in exchange

l36.name: Woman attacks man who climbs a tree
l36.description: When a man climbs a tree (escaping from persecutor; to get bird nestlings, honey, fruits, etc.), his wife (rare: her brother) kills, injures him or turns into demonic creature who pursues him

h36f.name: Raven is a failed messenger
h36f.description: Raven is sent to deliver important object or message. It distorts message, loses object

b29.name: Eschatological feast
b29.description: People turn into animals, birds or stones at a feast, after the feast, after performing a ritual or after a victory over dangerous enemy

h42.name: Creator goes away for a while
h42.description: After creating the bodies of the first people or after getting a conception how to do it the Creator goes away for a while. During his absence another person, because of his or her ignorance or intentionally, spoils the creation or makes himself or herself what the Creator would make in a better way. Usually because of this people are mortal and subject to diseases

b70.name: Ears of hare
b70.description: Person beats hares, foxes or other medium size animals who became helpless (usually closed in his house). Tale explains why tips of the animals' ears or tails have a particular color

a13b.name: Ants shade the Sun
a13b.description: During an eclipse or during the first night ants shade or shaded the Sun

b72.name: The thirsty cuckoo
b72.description: Children do not give water to their mother or mother to her child. The offended person turns into a bird, usually a cuckoo

b30a.name: Murdered person turns into fish
b30a.description: Fish emerges from remains of a killed person or creature

b107.name: The black oyster
b107.description: During a (world) fire oyster was burned, nor now oyster shells are black

f65b.name: Death feigned to eat burial food
f65b.description: Man pretends to die because he does not want to share food with the others and eats it alone at his burial place

m126.name: Silent skull
m126.description: Person comes across severed head or skull who speaks and tells others about his experience. When chief, king etc. comes to control information, the skull keeps silence and the man is punished as a liar

m112.name: Animals dig a well
m112.description: An animal person refuses to dig or clean a source of drinking water together with other animals or birds but takes advantage of the results of the work

b51a.name: Snake and swallow
b51a.description: Swallow does not let snake to destroy people. Usually the snake sends mosquito or other bloodsucking insect to get know whose blood is the most delicious. The insect flies back to report that human blood is the sweetest. Swallow bites its tongue off and the snake gets to pull off feathers from the swallow's tail

k90.name: The black and the red ones
k90.description: A man gets to see two fighting monsters or animals of contrasted colors (red and black, black and white). He helps one of them and/or one of them helps him

f9.name: A dangerous woman
f9.description: For different reasons, sexual contact with a woman is deadly dangerous for a man

m113.name: Thirsty bird cries for water
m113.description: During the hottest month of the summer or permanently birds of certain species are prohibited to drink from the water bodies and can quench their thirst only from rain drops and dew on leaves. That is why this bird always cries calling for rain

i120.name: Cornucopia
i120.description: Food and clothes are extracted from the horn of a cow or goat

m70a.name: Old woman is pierced through
m70a.description: An old woman defecates or breaks wind over a man. He kills her inserting a cutting object into her anus or vagina

f18d.name: Long clitoris
f18d.description: Female genitals are as long as a big snake

l33b.name: Trickster provokes a rock
l33b.description: Person suggests to another who looks like being unable to move (rock, stump, fire) a race competition. The competitor becomes to move, burns or crashes the person or runs away with his clothes

l66.name: Tunnel under the monster
l66.description: A small animal digs an underground hole to the place where the monstrous stag, elk, antelope, or buffalo lies. Hero climbs along the tunnel and kills the monster

m128.name: Variegated animals
m128.description: Hero comes to an agreement with antagonist that he can take animals of particular color. He gets to change color of the animals and takes all or most of them

i125.name: The Hiades are a jaw-bone
i125.description: The Hyades are a jaw bone or a head of a big animal or anthropomorphic creature

j58.name: The arrow ladder
j58.description: Persons make chain of arrows or darts shooting them one into another and making a chain or rope of them. Usually, they ascend by this rope to the upper world

b16c.name: Salt-grinding mill
b16c.description: Magic mill is ordered to grind salt but not ordered to stop. It sinks into ocean and continues to work making the water salty

j41b.name: Son returns and burns tormentors using magic
j41b.description: When hero returns and finds his mother being tormented during his absence, he burns the tormentors producing fire and heat by magic

l40.name: Reflection and shadow
l40.description: Person discovers (rare: ever fails to discover) another seeing his or her shadow or reflection in water; usually the first person makes the second one to descend to the ground

b76.name: Waves turn into mountains
b76.description: Waves of the sea petrified and turned into dry land with mountain chains

d8.name: Fire and a predator animal
d8.description: Fire or summer is stolen from a big predator: a lion (in Africa), a tiger (in Asia), a bear (in Siberia and North America) or a jaguar (in South America)

m81.name: Blind persons
m81.description: A man travels and comes to two or several blind (usually old) persons

e37.name: Peoples from sticks
e37.description: Creator takes many small sticks, transforms them into people of both sexes and all ages

k56a.name: The unworthy girl fails, the worthy one succeeds
k56a.description: Two or three sisters are sent in succession to powerful person. The first or the first and the second sister behave in a wrong way, perish or do not succeed. The last one behaves correctly, gets a reward

m192.name: The dried up skin
m192.description: A carrion-eating animal who crawled into a fresh carcass or put on a fresh animal skin cannot free himself when the carcass or the skin becomes dry. He gets free when is becomes soft again or somebody tears it open

l87.name: Taste of blood
l87.description: Unintentionally, person gets to taste his or her own blood or flesh, likes the taste, turns into a cannibal
